Today she offers party services designed specifically for children. This Kiva loan is the first loan she has received from Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo. She will use the funds to buy kindergarten games to rent out and invest in promotional leaflets to advertise her business.

Her dreams are to have her own home and devote all of her efforts for her family so that her children can experience well-being and receive a quality education.

loan.use: to purchase kindergarten games and invest in promotional leaflets.

loan.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose lives in the Nakulabye neighborhood in the city of Kampala, Uganda. She is married and has one child who is not yet in school. Rose has a business of selling used shoes. She has been in this business for seven years, and she works seven days out of every week. Rose sells her products at the market, by means of retail.
Rose has requested a loan of 1,000,000 UGX from MCDT SACCO, which she will use to buy more bales of used shoes. She generates additional income through selling passion juice. The main business challenges for Rose include defaulters and the rainy season, which hinders her customers from reaching her.
Her goals and aspirations for her business are to start importing shoes herself, and also to buy a plot of land and build her own rental rooms. She lives in a home that she rents, where she doesn't have access to electricity but does have access to piped water. Her major monthly expenses include rent.

loan.use: to buy more bales of secondhand shoes.

loan.name: Gertrudis Patricia

texts.es: Gertrudis, es originaria de Len ,tiene 40 aos de edad , es madre de 4 hijos de 18,16,12 y 4 aos de edad , ella es comerciante , se dedica a vender tortilla y frijoles .Ella inicio a los 35 aos de edad pues con contaba con muchas opciones de trabajo y tenia 4 hijos a quienes mantener ,ya que no aprendi ninguna carrera solo llego hasta sexto grado de primaria pues sus padres no tenan como pagar sus estudios. En vista de la necesidad que haba fue que se puso a hacer tortilla y coser frijoles para vender antes trabajaba como domestica pero ya despus no sigui por la situacin econmica, as ha venido luchando poco a poco por ganarse la vida y llevar el alimento diario a sus hijos. Su hija mayor despus de la escuela la ayuda a elaborar tortillas. Ella solicito el prstamo para comprar materia prima para trabajar como maz y lea. Con esta inversin podr adquirir mas material de trabajo para producir mas, aumentar sus ventas y mejorar sus ingresos. Tiene como meta prxima hacerles mejoras de infraestructura a su negocio pues realmente las necesita.
texts.en:
Gertrudis is a native of Len. She is 40 years old and the mother of four children (ages 18, 16, 12, and 4). Gertrudis is a merchant who sells tortillas and beans. She started this business when she was 35 since she had many options to work and four children to support. Gertrudis does not have a degree and only completed school through the sixth grade because her parents could not pay for her studies.

As a result of her familys needs, Gertrudis began preparing tortillas and beans to sell. She previously worked as a housekeeper, but she was not able to continue because of her financial situation. Gertrudis gradually strives to earn a living and provide for the daily needs of her children. Her oldest daughter helps her with preparing tortillas when she comes home from school.

The loan she is requesting will be used to buy supplies for her work, such as corn and firewood. With this investment, she will be able to acquire more of the materials she uses in her work so that she can increase production. This will help improve her sales and generate more income. Her next goal is to make needed improvements to the infrastructure of her business.

loan.use: to purchase corn and firewood.

loan.name: Marcos Ramiro

texts.es:
Marcos Ramiro tiene 52 aos, es casado vive con la esposa y con los hijos en el Cantn Chillanes Provincia de Bolvar tiene uno hijo de 16 aos.
Los miembros de la V.R.C. COOPERATIVA Patrn San Miguel se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Pailaloma a 60 minutos de la oficina pertenece al Cantn Chillanes, esta ventanilla de 13 miembros se dedica a las labores agrcolas de cultivos de maz, papas y trigo.
Marcos se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz, papas y trigo, los productos los compra en Chillanes y en San Pablo cada fin de mes y los vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes.
Solicita el crdito para la comprar de insumos para los cultivos adems de fertilizantes y abonos. Con el apoyo del crdito le ayudara econmicamente para suplir sus necesidades y aumentar la produccin. Enfrentar desafos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueo es educar al hijo y comprar terrenos.
Le gusta hacer deporte y festejar el carnaval.
texts.en:
Marcos Ramiro is 52 years old, married, and lives with his wife and child in the canton of Chillanes in Bolivar Province. He has a 16-year-old son.

The members of the Communal Bank Cooperativa Patrn San Miguel (St. Michaels Cooperative) meet in the neighborhood of Pailaloma, which is located 60 minutes away from the Cooperativa San Jose office in the canton of Chillanes. This Communal Bank has 13 members who engage in farm activities that involve growing corn, potatoes, and wheat.

Marcos is a farmer who grows corn, potatoes, and wheat. His supplies are purchased in Chillanes and San Pablo at the end of each month. He sells his goods at the fair every Sunday in Chillanes.

Marcos is requesting a loan to buy supplies for his crops, such as fertilizers and compost. The support from this loan will help him financially to access what he needs to increase production. Among the challenges he faces are pests, diseases, and changes in weather. His dreams are to provide his son with an education and to buy more land.

He enjoys playing sports and celebrating the Carnival festivities.

loan.use: to purchase fertilizers and compost.

loan.name: Hadjah

texts.en:
Hadjah lives in the Makerere neighborhood in the city of Kampala, Uganda. She is married and has two children, both of whom are in school. She also takes care of additional family members (her old parents). Hadjah has a business of selling charcoal. She has been in this business for seven years and she works seven days out of every week. She sells her products at the market, by means of retail.
Hadjah has requested a loan of 1,500,000 UGX from MCDT SACCO, which she will use to buy more bags of charcoal. She generates additional income through rental rooms. Her main business challenges include transportation and the rainy season, which hinders her customers from reaching her.
Her goals and aspirations for her business are to own a delivery van and to build more rental rooms. She lives in a home that she owns where she has access to electricity but not to piped water. Her major monthly expenses include school fees and feeding the family.

loan.use: to buy more bags of charcoal.

loan.name: Joseph S.k.'s Group

texts.en:
Salone Microfinance Trust (SMT), a partner of Kiva.org in Makeni, northern Sierra Leone, is very pleased to present to you the teachers of the SLMB Primary School Upper, situated in Mile Ninety One, a small town in the Tonkolili district in northern Sierra Leone. They are requesting a loan of 7,200,000 SLL. With the help of this loan, some of these teachers will invest in businesses, while others will pay school fees for their children, and so on. At the end of each month, the schools bursar is directly responsible for repaying SMT on these borrowers behalf.
Joseph is a teacher at the school and the leader of this group. The 48-year-old has been in the teaching profession for twenty-three years now. A native of Mile Ninety One town, Joseph is married and has four children. Joseph has requested a loan of 2,700,000 SLL in order to pay school fees for his children.
(Attached to this photo are snapshots of Mohamed and Mamusu, borrowers who were not able to be present for the group photo).

loan.use: to pay school fees for his children.

loan.name: Blanca Dorila

texts.es:
Blanca Dorila tiene 70 aos, es casada vive con el esposo y con un hijos de 17 aos en el Cantn Chillanes Provincia de Bolvar.
Los miembros de la V.R.C. COOPERATIVA Patrn San Miguel se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Pailaloma a 60 minutos de la oficina pertenece al Cantn Chillanes, esta ventanilla de 13 miembros se dedica a las labores agrcolas de cultivos de maz, papas y trigo.
Blanca se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz, papas y trigo, los productos los compra en Chillanes y en San Pablo cada fin de mes y los vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes.
Solicita el crdito para la comprar de insumos para los cultivos adems de fertilizantes y abonos. Con el apoyo del crdito le ayudara econmicamente para suplir sus necesidades y aumentar la produccin. Enfrentar desafos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueo es dar la educacion a su hijo para que sea un profesional.
se considera un apersona alegre y solidaria.
texts.en:
Blanca Dorila is 70 years old, married, and lives with her husband and a 17-year-old son in the canton of Chillanes in Bolivar Province.

The members of the Communal Bank Cooperativa Patrn San Miguel (St. Michaels Cooperative) meet in the neighborhood of Pailaloma, which is located 60 minutes away from the Cooperativa San Jose office in the canton of Chillanes. This Communal Bank has 13 members who engage in farm activities that involve growing corn, potatoes, and wheat.

Blanca is a farmer who grows corn, potatoes, and wheat. Her supplies are bought in Chillanes and San Pablo at the end of each month. She sells her goods at the fair every Sunday in Chillanes.

Blanca is requesting a loan to buy supplies for her crops, such as fertilizers and compost. The support from this loan will help her financially to access what she needs to increase production. Among the challenges she faces are pests, diseases, and changes in weather. Her dream is to provide an education for her son so that he can become a professional.

Blanca is considered to be a cheerful and supportive person.

loan.use: to purchase fertilizers and compost.

loan.name: Susana

texts.es:
Susana es socia del Banco Comunal Hermanas de Choquetanca II, ubicado en el distrito Ilave, provincia El Collao departamento de Puno, tiene 31 aos de edad, est casada y tiene un hijo en edad escolar. La seora cuenta con estudios secundarios. Susana es una socia nueva que recientemente se incorpora al Movimiento Manuela Ramos, solicitar un prstamo por la suma de S/. 1000.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invertir en su negocio, ella se dedica a la compra y venta de ganados vacunos, ovinos y porcinos.
Con este dinero, ms el capital con el que dispone, comprar una vaca. Ella trabaja junto con su esposo. Su sueo es tener ms capital para mejorar el ganado y as mejorar sus ingresos. Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la facilidad del prstamo.
texts.en:
Susana is a member of the Communal Bank Hermanas de Choquetanca II which is located in the District of Ilave, El Collao Province, Department of Puno. She is 31 years old, married, and has a son who is in school. Sra. Susana has a high school education.

She is a new member who recently joined Manuela Ramos. Susana is requesting a loan in the amount of 1000 PEN and will invest the money in her business. She buys and sells cows, sheep, and pigs.

With this money, she will have more capital to buy a cow. She and her husband work together. Her dream is to have more capital so that she can improve her livestock and generate more income. What she enjoys about the Communal Bank is the convenience of the loan.

loan.use: to purchase a cow.

loan.name: Akouele

texts.fr: Revendeuse ambulante des produits de premires ncessits (spaguetti, riz) Akoul ge de 33ans est marie un tailleur et mre de deux enfants. Cette activit quelle a commence en 2008 lui permet de ramener la crote journalire de sa famille car elle tient normment son rle de mre au foyer. Toute son activit est base au pays.
texts.en: Akoul is a 33 year-old mother of two who is married to a tailor. She conducts door-to-door sales of staple foods (spaghetti, rice etc). She entered this trade in 2008, and the money that it generates enables her to see to her family's needs - in her eyes this is fundamental to her role as a mother. All of her business is generated in and around her area.

loan.use: to purchase staple food products (spaghetti, rice etc)

loan.name: Klever Antonio

texts.es:
Klever Antonio tiene 27 aos, es soltero vive con los padres en el Cantn Chillanes Provincia de Bolvar, no tiene hijos.
Los miembros de la V.R.C. COOPERATIVA Patrn San Miguel se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Pailaloma a 60 minutos de la oficina pertenece al Cantn Chillanes, esta ventanilla de 13 miembros se dedica a las labores agrcolas de cultivos de maz, papas y trigo.
Klever Antonio se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz, papas y trigo, los productos los compra en Chillanes y en San Pablo cada fin de mes y los vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes.
Solicita el crdito para la comprar de insumos para los cultivos adems de fertilizantes y abonos. Con el apoyo del crdito le ayudara econmicamente para suplir sus necesidades y aumentar la produccin. Enfrentar desafos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueo es llegar a tener casa propia.
Le gusta hacer deporte, festejar las fiestas del carnaval y estar con la familia que es muy unidad.
texts.en:
Klever Antonio is 27 years old, single, and lives with his parents in the canton of Chillanes in Bolivar Province. He has no children.

The members of the Communal Bank Cooperativa Patrn San Miguel (St. Michaels Cooperative) meet in the neighborhood of Pailaloma, which is located 60 minutes away from the Cooperativa San Jose office in the canton of Chillanes. This Communal Bank has 13 members who engage in farm activities that involve growing corn, potatoes, and wheat.

Klever Antonio is a farmer who grows corn, potatoes, and wheat. His supplies are purchased in Chillanes and San Pablo at the end of each month. He sells his goods at the fair every Sunday in Chillanes.

Klever Antonio is requesting a loan to buy supplies for his crops, such as fertilizers and compost. The support from this loan will help him financially to access what he needs to increase production. Among the challenges he faces are pests, diseases, and changes in weather. His dream is to have a house of his own.

He enjoys playing sports, celebrating the Carnival festivities, and being part of a very close family.

loan.use: to purchase fertilizers and compost.

loan.name: Muniru

texts.en:
This is 26-year-old Miniru. He is married and has two children, aged 6 and 2. In 2005, Miniru established his provisions business. He began his business because he wanted to have more income to provide a livelihood for his family. Working seven days a week and thirteen hours a day, he earns about $210 every month from this business.
He would like a loan in the amount of 3,000,000 SLL. Miniru requires a loan in order to buy milk, sugar, margarine, an additional carton of sweets, a carton of Tiger batteries, a carton of Bama mayonnaise and a carton of cheese. He hopes that this loan will enable him to increase his monthly profits by approximately $47. In the future, Miniru plans to get a bigger shop and to educate his children. He thanks you for your support.

loan.use: to buy milk, sugar, margarine, sweets, batteries, mayonnaise and cheese.

loan.name: Deivis

texts.es: Deivis es un joven de 29 aos que vive con su cnyuge y sus 2 hijos en las edades de 16 aos y 4 meses en Ciudad Bicentenario, macroproyecto objeto de intervencin de la Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo en su ejercicio misional de construir comunidades auto sostenibles. Desde all Deivis ofrece sus servicios como tcnico en pulimento de vehculos, actividad que inici cuando buscando ingresos para su hogar, decidi ofrecer sus servicios de lavado de vehculos por principales avenidas de la ciudad, pero como Deivis es un joven de muchas aspiraciones logr dar otro matiz , una vez realiz estudios de pulimiento y mantenimiento externo de vehculos, logrando su ttulo como tcnico en esta actividad, en la que se desempea con mucho esmero y suea con hacerla crecer, porque ms adelante su meta es tener un local propio para aumentar su reconocimiento, ofreciendo servicios ms efectivos a sus clientes y con ello lograr aumentar sus ingresos, con tal de fomentar el bienestar de su familia y ofrecerle una educacin de calidad a sus hijos. Su credikiva es el primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo con l comprar materias primas para la preparacin de productos de limpieza y cera para el pulimiento de vehculos. Su mayor desafo es atender a sus clientes sin tener un puesto fijo, por eso todos los das trabaja con el fin de ahorrar y lograr un espacio bien organizado donde desarrollar su actividad.
texts.en:
Deivis is a young man who is 29 years of age. He lives with his wife and their two children (ages 16 and 4 months) in Ciudad Bicentenario, a large-scale housing and intervention project undertaken by Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo. The mission of this project is to build self-sustaining communities.

In this community, Deivis offers car wash services. He started this business because he needed a way to earn household income. Deivis decided to offer his services to vehicles that travel along the main avenues of the city. Being a young man with many aspirations started to give him more purpose. As soon he completed courses in polishing and maintaining vehicle exteriors, he became certified as a technician to work in this type of business. His skill is demonstrated through the great care he takes in making his business grow. Going forward his goal is to have his own location where can he can attract more business, offer more effective services to his customers, and generate more income to help him provide for the welfare of his family and pay for a quality education for his children.

This Kiva loan is his first with Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo. Deivis will use the funds to buy materials for preparing cleaning products and car wax for polishing vehicles. His greatest challenge is attending to his customers without having an established location. For this reason, he works every day so that he can save toward acquiring an organized space where he can develop his business.

loan.use: to purchase cleaning materials and car wax.

loan.name: Jose

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal PEROLNIYOC; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de URUBAMBA, perteneciente a la provincia de URUBAMBA y departamento de Cusco.
El socio es el Sr. Jose; el tiene 50 aos de edad y es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de granos secos como trigo,maz,cebada y moraya,el socio vende en el mercado de Urubamba desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, el socio tambin tiene una tierra de cultivo donde siembra maz y tambin lo vende en las diferentes ferias que existe, el socio quiere ampliar el negocio de compra y venta de granos secos. El socio solicita el prstamo para comprar granos secos como maz, trigo, cebada y moraya al por mayor.
El socio est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: This member belongs to the community bank "Perolniyoc". The bank is located in the Urubamba district, which belongs to the Urubamba province in the department of Cusco. The member is Jose. He is 50 years old, lives with his partner, and has 1 son. He combines his daily chores with running a business buying and selling dried grains like wheat, corn, barley and dried potatoes. He sells his goods in the Urubamba market from 9:00am until 6:00pm. He also has some land where he grows corn and he also sells at the fairs. He wants to grow his business buying and selling dried goods. The member is requesting a loan to buy dried grains like corn, wheat, barley, and dried potatoes in bulk. He is happy to get the loan and promises to make the repayments on time.

loan.use: to buy dried grains such as corn, wheat, and dried potatoes in bulk

loan.name: Kofi

texts.fr: Transitaire au Port Autonome de Lom(PAL) depuis 2003, Kofi est mari et pre de 03 enfants.il opre dans la Zone portuaire pour les besoins des clients qui le sollicite pour le ddouanement de leurs marchandises. Ce crdit dans notre institution lui servira acheter une moto pour lui faciliter les navettes effectues dans son travail et rendre de surcrot plus efficace ce quil fait dj bien.
texts.en: Koffi is a married father of three who has worked as a freight broker at Lom's port since 2003. His work at the port entails assisting customers to pass their goods through customs. This loan would enable him to purchase a motorbike which would enable him to reach his customers' ferries more easily and efficiently.

loan.use: to purchase a motorbike

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to purchase pigs, leaves, bags, tomatoes, cornmeal, onions and other items.

loan.name: Anonymous Group
loan.use: to buy soft drinks, batteries, mints, soaps, etc. in large quantities to add to his business.

loan.name: Elisa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal PEROLNIYOC; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Elisa; ella tiene 41 aos de edad y es soltera y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de servicio de cabina de internet y tambin tiene fotocopiadora, la socia tambin es profesora del nivel inicial en el distrito de Ollantaytambo, ella trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 1:00 p.m y en las tardes atiende la cabina de internet, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de servicio de internet. La socia solicita el prstamo para mantenimiento de la computadoras, para comprar papales y recargar las maquinas impresoras.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: The member belongs to the community bank "Perolniyoc". The bank is located in the Urubamba district, which belongs to the province of Urubamba and the department of Cusco. The member is Elisa. She is 41 years old, single, and has one daughter. She combines her daily chores with a business running an internet kiosk and photocopier. She is also a first grade teacher in the Ollantaytambo district. She works from 8:00am until 1:00pm and in the afternoons she staffs her internet kisosk. She wants to grow her internet business. She is requesting a loan for the maintenance of the computers, to buy paper, and to recharge the printer cartridges. The member is happy to have the loan and promises to make the repayments on time.

loan.use: to maintain the computers, to buy paper, and to recharger the printer cartridges.

loan.name: Mikafumawu

texts.fr: Age de 56ans, cette est veuve de 04 enfants. Elle opre dans la restauration depuis 2002. Elle vend de faon ambulante aprs achat des ingrdients au march dAkodesswa. Ce premier cycle lui servira acheter les produits de restauration (riz, huile, mais, tomate) pour tout dabord louer un local pour satisfaire plus sa demande croissante et prendre en charge ses 04 enfants.
texts.en: Mme Mikafumawu is a 56 year-old widow and a mother of four children. She has run a catering operation since 2002. She sources food ingredients from the Akodesswa market and then sells her wares via door-to-door sales. This first loan will enable her to purchase food items (rice, oil, corn, tomatoes etc) and to rent a small outlet from which she will be able to better meet her customers' demands. The money that she aims to generate will enable her to look after her the needs of her four children.

loan.use: to purchase food items

loan.name: Mariana De Jesus

texts.es:
Mariana de 30 aos, es una mujer trabajadora que tiene un depsito de bebidas en una parte de su casa. Trabaja repartiendo bebidas a las tiendas y distribuyndolas a los diferentes clientes que le solicitan.
En la actualidad trabaja desde las 06h00am repartiendo las botellas hasta las 22h00pm que se las da a su ltimo comprador. Las botellas las vende por docena y por unidad a un valor muy econmico para el cliente. Vende colas, guitte, agua. Quiere seguir con su negocio por eso quiere comprar con el prstamo mas bebidas como botellas de colas, agua con gas etc. Su sueo es tener un carro para repartir con ms agilidad las botellas a los clientes.
texts.en:
Mariana, 30, is a hard-working woman who warehouses soft drinks in part of her house. She delivers them to stores and to different customers who request them.
She works from 6 am delivering the bottles until 10 pm when she sees her last customer. She sells the bottles by the dozen and each unit is economical for her customers. She sells colas, mineral water, (Guite brand) and water. She would like to continue with her business and thats why she is requesting the loan to purchase more drinks such as bottles of cola, mineral water, etc. Her dream is to have a car so that it will be much easier to make the deliveries .

loan.use: To purchase bottled drinks to sell

loan.name: Luis Edalio

texts.es:
Luis Edalio tiene 48 aos, es casado vive con la esposa y con el hijo en el Cantn Chillanes Provincia de Bolvar.
Los miembros de la V.R.C. COOPERATIVA Patrn San Miguel se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Pailaloma a 60 minutos de la oficina pertenece al Cantn Chillanes, esta ventanilla de 13 miembros se dedica a las labores agrcolas de cultivos de maz, papas y trigo.
Luis se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz, papas y trigo, los productos los compra en Chillanes y en San Pablo cada fin de mes y los vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes.
Solicita el crdito para la comprar de insumos para los cultivos adems de fertilizantes y abonos. Con el apoyo del crdito le ayudara econmicamente para suplir sus necesidades y aumentar la produccin. Enfrentar desafos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueo es dar la educacion a su hijo para que sea un profesional.
Le gusta caminar por el campo.
texts.en:
Luis Edalio is 48, married, and lives with his wife and son in Chillanes Canton in Bolvar Province. He is a member of the Patrn San Miguel Cooperativa Communal Bank, located in the village of Pailaloma, 60 minutes from the Cooperativa office for Chillanes Canton. The 13 members of this bank do agricultural work, cultivating corn, potatoes, and wheat.
Luis plants corn, potatoes, and wheat. He buys his products in Chillanes and in San Pablo at the end of each month, and sells them at the Sunday market in Chillanes. He requests the loan to purchase supplies for his crops, as well as fertilizers and manure. The support from this loan will help him meet his financial needs and increase his production, as well as face challenges such as insect infestations, illnesses, and the vagaries of the weather.
His dream is to provide for the education of his son so he can be a professional. He enjoys walking through the countryside.

loan.use: to purchase supplies for his crops, as well as fertilizers and manure

loan.name: Sara

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal PEROLNIYOC; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Sara; ella tiene 37 aos de edad y es conviviente y tiene 5 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes que trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 9:00 p.m y tambin en sus ratos libres la socia se dedica a realizar trabajos de saln de belleza como cortar el cabello o hacer teidos, por medio de estos pequeos negocios la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes y tambin mejorar el servicio de saln de belleza. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar productos como arroz, azcar, fideos, aceite y golosinas para la tienda de abarrotes.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sara belongs to the Perolniyoc Communal Bank. The bank is located in the Urubamba district, Urubamba province, Cusco department.
Sara, age 37, has a life partner and five children. She alternates her daily activities with her business, a grocery store. She works from 6:00 a.m. until 9:00 p.m. In her free time she does beautician work like cutting hair and dyeing hair. Through these small businesses she gets her children ahead.
She wants to expand her grocery store business, and she wants to improve her beauty salon service. She is requesting the loan to buy products like rice, sugar, noodles, oil, and sweets for her grocery store.
She is happy about the loan, and she pledges to make her payments.

loan.use: to buy products like rice, sugar, noodles, oil, and sweets for her grocery store.

loan.name: Nomanyo Abla Sitsofe

texts.fr: Rsidant Akodesswa (un quartier du pays), Mme Abla est clibataire. Elle se donne lactivit de vente de sous-vtement de femmes et enfants depuis 2004 de faon ambulante aprs avoir achet au Grand March de Lom. Ce premier prt lui servira acheter les articles afin de vendre pour louer un local afin de mieux se positionner pour satisfaire ses nombreuses clientes et prparer mieux sa future vie maritale.
texts.en: A resident of Akodesswa (an area of the country), Mrs. Abla is single. She has dedicated herself to the business of selling women's and children's undergarments as a travelling salesperson since 2004, after having bought her products at the Big Market of Lom. This first loan will serve to purchase products in order to sell them, so that she can rent a place to better position herself to meet the needs of her numerous customers and prepare for her future marital life.

loan.use: to purchase women's and children's undergarments.

loan.name: Sonia

texts.es: Sonia es socia del Banco Comunal Hermanas de Choquetanca II, ubicado en el distrito Ilave, provincia El Collao departamento de Puno, tiene 25 aos de edad, est casada y tres hijos. Estudi educacin secundaria. Sonia trabaja Junto a su esposo, ellos se dedican a la compra y venta de ganados como ovinos vacunos. Su esposo tambin se dedica a la pesquera, negocio al que se dedica paralelamente para generar otros ingresos. La seora trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace un ciclo, con su primer prstamo solicitado que fue por la suma de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, invirti en su negocio. Con ste nuevo prstamo de S/. 1000.00 nuevos soles, incrementar al capital de su negocio para comprar una vaca lechera. Como casi todos en Puno, Sonia tambin se dedican a la chacra, con esto ella puede sustentar gastos menores del hogar. Su sueo es tener capital propio para tener ganados mejorados. Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es el trabajo en grupo. En la foto la podemos ver junto a su hija menor.
texts.en:
Sonia is a member of the "Hermanas de Choquetanca II" Communal Bank, which is located in the Ilave district of El Collao province in Puno department. She is 25 years old, married, and has three children. She has a secondary level education.
Sonia works, together with her husband, buying and selling animals such as sheep and cattle. Her husband is also a fisherman, a business he runs on the side to generate additional income.
Sonia has worked with the Manuela Ramos Movement Organization for one loan cycle. She invested her first loan of 500 soles (PEN) in her business. With this new loan of 1000 soles (PEN), she will increase her working capital by purchasing a milk cow.
Like almost everyone in Puno, Sonia also farms, and with this she can cover minor household expenses. Her dream is to have her own capital so she can improve her animals. Her favorite part of the Communal Bank is working in a group.
The photo shows Sonia with her younger daughter.

loan.use: to purchase a milk cow

loan.name: Martha Cecilia

texts.es:
Martha Cecilia tiene 39 aos, es soltera vive con los padres en el Cantn Chillanes Provincia de Bolvar.
Los miembros de la V.R.C. COOPERATIVA Patrn San Miguel se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Pailaloma a 60 minutos de la oficina pertenece al Cantn Chillanes, esta ventanilla de 13 miembros se dedica a las labores agrcolas de cultivos de maz, papas y trigo.
Martha se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz, papas y trigo, los productos los compra en Chillanes y en San Pablo cada fin de mes y los vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes.
Solicita el crdito para la comprar de insumos para los cultivos adems de fertilizantes y abonos. Con el apoyo del crdito le ayudara econmicamente para suplir sus necesidades y aumentar la produccin. Enfrentar desafos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueo es algun dia comprar ganado para dedicarse a la cianza y venta de estos.
Le gustar pasar tiempo con la familia.
texts.en:
Martha Cecilia is 39 years old, single and lives with her parents in Chillanes Canton, Bolvar Province.
The Patrn San Miguel (Patron Saint Michael) communal banks members are located in Pailaloma Recinto, 60 minutes from the office. It belongs to Chillanes Canton. This communal bank has 13 members dedicated to corn, potato and wheat farming.
Martha is a corn, potato and wheat farmer. She buys her supplies in Chillanes and in San Pablo at the end of each month and her sales take place during the Sunday market in Chillanes.
She is asking for the loan to buy some farming supplies in addition to fertilizer and manure. Support from the loan will help her economically to meet her needs and increase production. The challenges she faces are infestations, illnesses and weather variations. Her dream is to buy livestock some day to go into animal raising.
She enjoys spending time with her family.

loan.use: to buy farming supplies, fertilizer and manure.

loan.name: Mireya Del Socorro

texts.es: Mireya Del Socorro de 40 aos, es madre soltera y tiene 2 hijos que trabajan de manera independiente. Su negocio consiste elaboracin y venta de nacatamales y repostera recuerda que inici desde pequea por sus padres, pero al poco tiempo not que este negocio tena mucha demanda, desde luego que sigui con esta actividad. Actualmente su negocio es la principal fuente de ingresos econmicos, adems tiene ms de 22 aos con este negocio ya que siempre esta brindado un buen servicio y esto les gusta a sus clientes. Con el crdito que solicita comprara cerdos y hojas, masa, tomate, cebolla, bolsas y otras cosas.
texts.en:
Mireya Del Socorro, 40, is a single mother of two children who work independently. Her business consists in the manufacturing of Nacatamales (Nicaraguan style tamales) and pastry. She remembers that she started out while still little with her parents but gradually noted that this business was in high demand so she continued with it.
Currently, the business is her main source of income. Shes had the business for 22 years because shes always provided good service and her customers like this. She will use the requested loan to buy pigs, banana leaves, masa (dough) or tamales, tomatoes, onions, bags and other things.

loan.use: to buy pigs, banana leaves, masa for tamales, tomatoes, onions, bags and other things.

loan.name: Orfa Raquel

texts.es: Orfa Raquel es socia del Banco Comunal Hermanas de Choquetanca II, ubicado en el distrito Ilave, provincia El Collao departamento de Puno, tiene 17 aos de edad, es conviviente y no tiene hijos. Tiene estudios secundarios (incompleto). Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace un ciclo, su primer prstamo solicitado fue por la suma de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invirti en su negocio de compra y venta de animales domsticos como ovino, vacuno y porcino. Con ste nuevo prstamo de S/. 1000.00 nuevos soles, comprar una vaquita, en este negocio le ayuda su esposo quien trabaja en construccin civil en la ciudad de Arequipa y la ayuda cuando llega a Puno. Su sueo es mejorar su casa y tener una mejor vivienda para el futuro. Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la reunin donde comparte con las dems socias.
texts.en:
Orfa Raquel is a member of the Sisters of Choquetanca II Communal Bank, located in the Llave district, province of El Collao, department of Puno. She is 17 years old, lives with her partner and has no children; she has a high school education but didnt graduate.

Orfa Raquel has worked with the Movimiento Manuela Ramos for a year, her first loan was S/. 500.00 nuevos soles and was used in her business, buying and selling domestic animals like sheep, cattle and pigs.

With this new loan of S/. 1000.00 nuevos soles she will buy a cow, her business helps her husband who works in construction in the city of Arequipa, he helps her when he arrives to Puno.

Orfa Raquels dream is to improve her house and have a better home for the future.

What she enjoys about her Communal Bank is the meetings that she attends with the other members.

loan.use: buy a cow.

loan.name: Elizabeth Eliana

texts.es:
Elizabeth Eliana tiene 20 aos, es soltera vive con los padres en el Cantn Chillanes Provincia de Bolvar.
Los miembros de la V.R.C. COOPERATIVA Patrn San Miguel se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Pailaloma a 60 minutos de la oficina pertenece al Cantn Chillanes, esta ventanilla de 13 miembros se dedica a las labores agrcolas de cultivos de maz, papas y trigo.
Elizabeth se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz, papas y trigo, los productos los compra en Chillanes y en San Pablo cada fin de mes y los vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes.
Solicita el crdito para la comprar de insumos para los cultivos adems de fertilizantes y abonos. Con el apoyo del crdito le ayudara econmicamente para suplir sus necesidades y aumentar la produccin. Enfrentar desafos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueo es llegar a terminar la carrera universitaria.
Se considera una persona alegre y solidaria.
texts.en:
Elizabeth Eliana is 20 years old, single and lives with her parents in the Chillanes neighborhood, province of Bolvar.

The V.R.C. COOPERATIVA Patrn San Miguel Communal Bank is located in the Pailaloma area some 60 minutes from the office in the Chillanes neighborhood. The Bank is made up of 13 members who are in agriculture; they grow corn, potatoes and wheat.

Elizabeth is a farmer; she grows corn, potatoes, and wheat. She buys her products in Chillanes and San Pablo at the end of each month and later sells them in the Sunday market of Chillanes.

Elizabeth needs the loan to buy materials for her crops as well as fertilizers and manure. The loan will help her economically to meet her needs and increase her production as she fights plagues, diseases and the change in climate that affects her crops. Elizabeths dream is to finish her university education.

She considers herself to be a loyal and happy-go-lucky person.

loan.use: buy materials for her crops as well as fertilizers and manure.

loan.name: Karina Patricia

texts.es:
Karina Patricia tiene 25 aos, es soltera vive con los padres en el Cantn Chillanes Provincia de Bolvar no tiene hijos.
Los miembros de la V.R.C. COOPERATIVA Patrn San Miguel se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Pailaloma a 60 minutos de la oficina pertenece al Cantn Chillanes, esta ventanilla de 13 miembros se dedica a las labores agrcolas de cultivos de maz, papas y trigo.
Karina se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz, papas y trigo, los productos los compra en Chillanes y en San Pablo cada fin de mes y los vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes.
Solicita el crdito para la comprar de insumos para los cultivos adems de fertilizantes y abonos. Con el apoyo del crdito le ayudara econmicamente para suplir sus necesidades y aumentar la produccin. Enfrentar desafos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueo es ser una profesiona y comprar un carro para los padres.
Le gusta escuchar musica.
texts.en:
Karina Patricia is 25 years old, single, has no children and lives with her parents in the Chillanes neighborhood, province of Bolvar.

The V.R.C. COOPERATIVA Patrn San Miguel Communal Bank is located in the Pailaloma area some 60 minutes from the office in the Chillanes neighborhood. The Bank is made up of 13 members who are in agriculture; they grow corn, potatoes and wheat.

Karina is a farmer; she grows corn, potatoes, and wheat. She buys her products in Chillanes and San Pablo at the end of each month and later sells them in the Sunday market of Chillanes.

Karina needs the loan to buy materials for her crops as well as fertilizers and manure. The loan will help her economically to meet her needs and increase her production as she fights plagues, diseases and the change in climate that affects her crops. Karinas dream is to be a professional and buy her parents a car.

Karina enjoys listening to music.

loan.use: buy materials for her crops as well as fertilizers and manure.

loan.name: Success Club Group

texts.en:
In the photo are members of the Success Club group. They are small scale businesspeople based in Magburaka, a town in northern Sierra Leone. The leader of this group is 28-year-old Osman. Osman sells toothpastes, batteries, biscuits, sardines, etc.
This is not the first time that Osman and his group members have benefited from a loan from SMT/Kiva lenders. With the help of a previous Kiva loan, they were able to expand their businesses both in size and quality. Having repaid their last loan successfully, they are again requesting for a new loan of 800,000 SLL for each in the group in order to further expand their respective businesses, make more profit and consequently improve on their standard of living.
Leader of the group, Osman, will use his share of the loan to buy toothpastes, batteries, biscuits, sardines, etc. in large quantity to add to his business.

loan.use: to buy toothpastes, batteries, biscuits, sardines, etc. in large quantity to add to his business

loan.name: Ofelia

texts.es: Ofelia es socia del Banco Comunal Hermanas de Choquetanca II, ubicado en el distrito Ilave, provincia El Collao departamento de Puno, tiene 26 aos de edad, est casada y tiene 2 hijos. Tiene grado de instruccin primaria (incompleta). La seora es una socia nueva que recientemente se incorpora al Movimiento Manuela Ramos, ella requiere de un prstamo de S/. 1000.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invertir en su negocio de compra y venta de ganado vacuno, ovino y porcino. Con ste prstamo comprar cuatro unidades de ovejitas. Ella trabaja junto con su esposo. Su sueo es seguir trabajando en este negocio ya que le resulta rentable. Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la facilidad del pago. En la foto se muestra cargando a su beb que tiene pocas semanas de nacido.
texts.en:
Ofelia is a member of the Sisters of Choquetanca II Communal Bank, located in the Llave district, province of El Collao, department of Puno. She is 26 years old, married and has 2 children; she has some primary school education but never completed it.

Mrs. Ofelia is a new member that has recently become a part of the Movimiento Manuela Ramos, she needs a loan of S/. 1000.00 nuevos soles. The money will be used in her business, buying and selling cattle, sheep and pigs, she will buy four little sheep. Ofelia works with her husband.

Her dream is to keep working on her business since it is profitable.

What Ofelia enjoys about her Communal Bank is the ease of her payments.

She is shown in the picture carrying her baby that is a few weeks old.

loan.use: buy four litte sheep.

loan.name: Inti Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal INTI; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito D. Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia D. Cusco y departamento D. Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Hilda; ella es casado y tiene 43 aos y tiene 3 hijos; La socia trabaja con su negocio D. crianza D. aves, ella cra pollos, los hace engordar y crecer y luego lo venD. en lugares como Izcuchaca,la socia tambin se dedica al negocio D. venta D. chompas, ella teje las chompas y luego lo venD. en forma ambulatoria, por medio D. estos negocios la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio D. crianza D. aves y negocio D. venta D. chompas. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar pollos y tambin para comprar lanas para que tejer las chompas.
Los otros socios se dedican al negocio D. restaurant, venta D. verduras, negocio D. venta D. chocolates, negocio D. venta D. artesania.
La socia agradece a quienes forman parte D. este sueo mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago D. sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the communal bank "INTI". This bank is located in the district, province, and department of Cusco.
One of the members is Hilda. She is married, is 43 years old, and has three children. She works with her business of raising birds. She raises chickens. She fattens them and makes them grow. Then, she sells them to places like Izcuchaca. She also has a business where she sells sweaters. She weaves the sweaters and then sells them as a street vendor. By means of these businesses she helps her children get ahead. She wants to grow and improve her businesses of bird raising and sweater selling. She is asking for this loan to buy chickens and also to buy wool to weave the sweaters.
The other members have a restaurant business, sell vegetables, have a chocolate business, and sell crafts.
Hilda is thankful to those who form part of this dream through this means. She promises to follow through with the payment of her dues in the established location.

loan.use: to buy chickens and wool to weave sweaters.

loan.name: Nilda

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal GRAN RENOVACION; El banco est ubicado en el distrito D. Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia D. Cusco y departamento D. Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Nilda; ella tiene 56 aos D. edad y es casada y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio D. venta D. productos D. belleza, ella venD. lpices labiales, perfumes, cremas entre otros productos D. belleza, ella venD. en forma independiente llevando a diferentes lugares como instituciones y pblico en general, la socia quiere mejorar y ampliar el negocio D. venta D. productos D. belleza. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar productos D. belleza al por mayor.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos D. su cuota.
texts.en:
The partner belongs to the communal bank "GRAN RENOVACION" [Great Renovation]. This bank is located in the district, province, and department of Cusco.
The partner is Nilda. She is 56 years old, is married, and has two children. She alternates her daily activities with the business of selling beauty products. She sells lipstick, perfume, and creams among other beauty products. She sells in an independent way, taking her products to different places such as institutions and the public in general. She wants to improve and enlarge the beauty products sales business. She is asking for this loan to buy wholesale beauty products.
She is happy because of the loan, and she promises to follow through with the payments of her dues.

loan.use: to buy wholesale beauty products.

loan.name: Primero De Mayo Group

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal PRIMERO DE MAYO; La socia vive en el distrito de Huanchac; en la provincia de Urubamba, Departamento del Cusco.
La socia Eufracia 38 aos de edad y La socia es conviviente y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades del hogar; la socia trabaja ayudando a su conyugue en la carpintera que l tiene, la socia apoya a su pareja en cuanto a los acabados ella barniza, pule los trabajos ya terminados, tambin se encarga de lijar, poner perillas, accesorios a los diferentes muebles. La socia tambin se dedica a la crianza de animales menores as como aves de corral (gallinas, pollos), cuyes y chanchitos. La socia vende los animalitos cuando estos alcanzan su periodo de madures. La socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la compra de animales menores y as incrementar sus ventas.
Los socios se dedican a la crianza de animales menores; a la venta de helados, a la atencin de una tienda de abarrotes, a la venta de comidas, a la venta de verduras.
La socia valora y agradece infinitamente el crdito que le otorgarn y de este modo podr mejorar su calidad de vida, as mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo estipulado.
texts.en:
The partner belongs to the communal bank "PRIMERO DE MAYO" [First of May]. The partner lives in the district of Huanchac, in the province of Urubamba, in the department of Cusco.
The member is Eufracia. She is 38 years old. She lives with her partner and has four children. She alternates her activities of the home. She works helping her spouse in the carpentry workshop that he has. She supports her partner by varnishing and polishing jobs that are already finished. She also deals with sanding and putting knobs and accessories on different forms of furniture. She also raises young animals like farm-yard birds (chickens), guinea pigs, and pigs. She sells the small animals when they reach maturity. She is asking for the loan to invest in the purchase of young animals and in this way increase her sales.
The partners raise young animals, sell ice-cream, have a grocery store, sell food, and sell vegetables.
Eufracia values and and is infinitely grateful for the loan that they will grant her. In this way she will be able to improve her quality of life. She promises to follow through with the payment of her dues in the established location.

loan.use: to buy young animals and increase their sales.

loan.name: Nilda

texts.es: Nilda es socia del Banco Comunal Hermanas de Choquetanca II, ubicado en el distrito Ilave, provincia El Collao departamento de Puno, tiene 24 aos de edad, est casada y tiene dos hijos. Nos cuenta que slo puedo estudiar hasta 3ro de secundaria. Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace un ciclo, con su primer prstamo solicitado fue de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invirti en su negocio compra y venta de animales domsticos como ovino, vacuno y porcinos. Como casi todas las pobladoras de Puno, tambin se dedica la chacra. Con ste nuevo prstamo de S/. 1000.00 nuevos soles, incrementar al capital de su negocio para comprar cinco unidades de ovejas. En el negocio trabaja junto con su esposo, tambin cuenta que su esposo trabaja en la pesca. Su sueo es tener ganados mejorados y as tener mayores ganancias. Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la reunin y la facilidad del prstamo.
texts.en:
Nilda is a member of the Sisters of Choquetanca II Communal Bank, located in the Llave district, province of El Collao, department of Puno. She is 24 years old, married and has two children; she says that she was only able to study up to her junior year of high school.

Nilda has worked with the Movimiento Manuela Ramos for a year, her first loan was S/. 500.00 nuevos soles and was used in her business, buying and selling domestic animals like sheep, cattle and pigs. As most of the inhabitants of Puno she works in a small farm.

With this new loan of S/. 1000.00 nuevos soles she will increase her work capital to buy five sheep. Nilda works with her husband who also works as a fisherman.

Nildas dream is to have better cattle to have more profits.

What she enjoys about her Communal Bank is the meetings and the ease of getting the loan.

loan.use: buy 5 sheep.

loan.name: Rubi Magly

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal GRAN RENOVACION; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Rubi Magly; ella tiene 29 aos de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de agencia de turismo y tambin trabaja en agencia de marketing, la socia por medio de este negocio y trabajo la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de agencia de internet. La socia solicita el prstamo para implementar la agencia para el mantenimiento de la computadora y para comprar un escritorio.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sra. Rubi Magly, 29, belongs to the GRAN RENOVACION community bank in the Peruvian "departamento" of Cusco.
She is partnered and has 2 children. She operates two businesses: a travel agency and a marketing company. She supports her two children with the income from the businesses and now she wants to expand her travel business by adding an Internet site. She will use this loan to repair her computer and buy a desk.
She is grateful for the loan and committed to repaying it in the agreed-upon time.

loan.use: to repair her computer and buy a desk for an Internet-based travel business.

loan.name: Santos Nasario

texts.es: Don Santos de 50 aos de edad es casado, tiene 2 hijos estudiando en la universidad, su esposa labora como maestra de primaria y le apoya con los gastos del hogar. Santos labora para Alcaldia de Juigalpa como policia municipal desde hace 1 ao. Esta solicitando su 1er credito con el objetivo de mejorar su vivienda cambiando una parte del techo, al mismo tiempo desea comprar gaseosas y otros productos para su pequeo negocio que tiene cerca de su trabajo. Su mayor sueo es poder brindarle a su familia mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en: Don Santos, 50, is married and has 2 children, both in college. His wife works and they share household expenses. Santos has worked as a policeman for the town of Juigalpa for 1 year. He is appying for this, his first loan, so that he can replace part of the roof on his house. He will also buy soft drinks and other products for a small retail business that he operates near his workplace. His greatest wish is to provide his family with a better life.

loan.use: to repair the roof on his house and to buy merchandise for his small retail business.

loan.name: Jairo Vinicio

texts.es:
Jairo Vinico tiene 21 aos, es soltero vive con los padres en el Cantn Chillanes Provincia de Bolvar, no tiene hijos.
Los miembros de la V.R.C. COOPERATIVA Patrn San Miguel se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Pailaloma a 60 minutos de la oficina pertenece al Cantn Chillanes, esta ventanilla de 13 miembros se dedica a las labores agrcolas de cultivos de maz, papas y trigo.
Jairo se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz, papas y trigo, los productos los compra en Chillanes y en San Pablo cada fin de mes y los vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes.
Solicita el crdito para la comprar de insumos para los cultivos adems de fertilizantes y abonos. Con el apoyo del crdito le ayudara econmicamente para suplir sus necesidades y aumentar la produccin. Enfrentar desafos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueo es tener terrenos propios y ganado.
Le gusta trabajar en la tierra.
texts.en:
Jairo Vinico is 21 years old, single, has no children and lives with his parents in the Chillanes neighborhood, province of Bolvar.

The V.R.C. COOPERATIVA Patrn San Miguel Communal Bank is located in the Pailaloma area some 60 minutes from the office in the Chillanes neighborhood. The Bank is made up of 13 members who are in agriculture; they grow corn, potatoes and wheat.

Jairo is a farmer; he grows corn, potatoes, and wheat. He buys his products in Chillanes and San Pablo at the end of each month and later sells them in the Sunday market of Chillanes.

He needs the loan to buy materials for his crops as well as fertilizers and manure. The loan will help Jairo economically to meet his needs and increase his production as he fights plagues, diseases and the change in climate that affects his crops.

Jairo's dream is to have his own plots of land and cattle.

He enjoys working the fields.

loan.use: buy materials for his crops as well as fertilizers and manure.

loan.name: Maria

texts.es: Mara es socia del Banco Comunal Hermanas de Choquetanca II, ubicado en el distrito Ilave, provincia El Collao departamento de Puno, tiene 41 aos de edad, est casada y tiene tres hijos en edad escolar. La seora estudio la secundaria. La seora es una socia nueva que recientemente se incorpora con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos, ella requiere de un prstamo de S/. 1000.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invertir en su negocio de compra y venta de ganados vacunos y ovinos, comprar una vaca en la localidad de Ilave. En el negocio trabaja junto con su esposo e hijos, tambin cuenta que hacen chacra como: papa, quinua y chuo. Su sueo es tener ganados mejorados y as generar mayores ingresos. Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la facilidad del prstamo.
texts.en:
Mara is a member of the Sisters of Choquetanca II Communal Bank, located in the Llave district, province of El Collao, department of Puno. She is 41 years old, married and has three children of school age, she finished high school.

Mrs. Mara is a new member that has recently become a part of the Movimiento Manuela Ramos, she needs a loan of S/. 1000.00 nuevos soles. The money will be used in her business of buying and selling cattle, sheep and pigs, she will buy a cow in the Llave area. Mara works with her husband and children since they also harvest potatoes, quinoa and chuo (a type of potato).

Her dream is to have better cattle to have more profits.

What Ofelia enjoys about her Communal Bank is the ease of her payments.

loan.use: buy a cow.

loan.name: Dezi

texts.en:
Dezi lives in the Nakulabye neighborhood in the city of Kampala, Uganda. She is single and has 5 children, three of whom are in school. She also takes care of additional family members (grandchildren).
Dezi has a food stall business. She has been in this business for 5 years and she works 7 days out of every week. Dezi sells her products at the market, by means of retail. Dezi has requested a loan of 1,000,000 Ugandan Shillings from MCDT SACCO, which she will use to buy more boxes of tomatoes, onions, oranges, bunches of bananas and a sack of cassava.
She also generates additional income through rental rooms.The main business challenges for Dezi include rainy weather which hinders her customers to reach out to her and transportation. Her goals and aspirations for her business are to start going to farmers directly and build more rental rooms.
Dezi lives in a home that she owns. She has access to electricity and doesn't have access to piped water. Her major monthly expenses include school fees and feeding the family.

loan.use: to buy more boxes of tomatoes, onions, oranges, cassava and bunches of bananas

loan.name: Carolina

texts.es: Carolina tienen es muy conocida en su comunidad, ya que es la duea de Uas Lemani un saln de belleza ubicado en Mollejones de Prez Zeledn. Hace 5 aos Carolina abri su propio negocio, un saln de Belleza que le ha permito superarse como madre y como microempresaria. La demanda es alta y necesita ampliar su negocio, es por eso que necesita un prstamo 594 000 (quinientos noventa y cuatro mil colones) para la compra de los materiales necesarios para ampliar su local y acondicionarlo con la herramientas de belleza necesarios. Carolina es muy positiva y asegura que podr reembolsar su crdito sin ningn problema que el negocio crecer aun mas, as como sus ingresos. Ella es socia de la empresa de Crdito Comunal Bancruce, una de las 110 empresas socias de EDESA en Costa Rica.
texts.en: Carolina is very well known in her community since she is the owner of Lemani Nails a beauty salon located in Mollejones de Prez Zeledn. 5 years ago, Carolina opened her own business, a beauty salon, that has allowed her to get ahead as a mother and a microentrepeneur. The demand for her services is high and she needs to expand her business and that is why she needs a loan of 594 000 (five hundred ninety-four thousand colones) to buy the materials necessary to expand her place and to set it up with the beauty tools necessary. Carolina is very positive and is sure that she will be able to pay back the loan without any problems since the business will grow as will her profits. Carolina is a member of the Bancruce Communal Bank, one of the 110 member companies of EDESA in Costa Rica.

loan.use: To buy beauty tools and construction materials.

loan.name: Yolanda Esmeralda

texts.es:
Yolanda Esmeralda tiene 48 aos, es soltera vive con una hija de 12 aos en el Cantn Chillanes Provincia de Bolvar.
Los miembros de la V.R.C. COOPERATIVA Patrn San Miguel se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Pailaloma a 60 minutos de la oficina pertenece al Cantn Chillanes, esta ventanilla de 13 miembros se dedica a las labores agrcolas de cultivos de maz, papas y trigo.
Yolanda se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz, papas y trigo, los productos los compra en Chillanes y en San Pablo cada fin de mes y los vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes.
Solicita el crdito para la comprar de insumos para los cultivos adems de fertilizantes y abonos. Con el apoyo del crdito le ayudara econmicamente para suplir sus necesidades y aumentar la produccin. Enfrentar desafos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueo es dar lo que la hija necesite sobre todo la educacion.
Ser una persona alegre.
texts.en:
Yolanda Esmeralda is 48 years old, single and lives with her 12 year old daughter in the Chillanes neighborhood, province of Bolvar.

The V.R.C. COOPERATIVA Patrn San Miguel Communal Bank is located in the Pailaloma area some 60 minutes from the office in the Chillanes neighborhood. The Bank is made up of 13 members who are in agriculture; they grow corn, potatoes and wheat.

Yolanda is a farmer; she grows corn, potatoes, and wheat. She buys her products in Chillanes and San Pablo at the end of each month and later sells them in the Sunday market of Chillanes.

Yolanda needs the loan to buy materials for her crops as well as fertilizers and manure. The loan will help her economically to meet her needs and increase her production as she fights plagues, diseases and the change in climate that affects her crops. Yolandas dream is to give her daughter everything she needs, especially and education.

She considers herself to be a happy person.

loan.use: buy materials for her crops as well as fertilizers and manure.

loan.name: Dewin Miguel

texts.es: Dewin de 32 aos tiene una tienda en el municipio de Malambo, ubicado a 15 minutos de la ciudad de Barranquilla; all vive con su cnyuge y su hijo de 6 aos de edad, familia que es su motivacin para dirigir todos sus esfuerzos de trabajo y lograr su bienestar. Dewin es un educador de profesin, que adquiri la experiencia de negocio en la casa de sus padres y l desde muy nio observ cmo ellos sacaron adelante a su familia mediante este trabajo. Por eso hace tres aos recibi una liquidacin y no dud en emprender su propia aventura, que hoy est convertida en una tienda que constituye importantes ingresos para su hogar. Este negocio es administrado por su esposa en las maanas y por l mismo en la tarde, porque trabaja en un colegio el otro medio tiempo. Su meta es apoyar su crecimiento para cada da ganar ms rentabilidad y muy seguramente lo lograr, porque es un hombre de familia, muy organizado y trabajador; su credikiva es el primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo con el cual comprar vveres, papelera, y en general artculos de miscelnea pues desea fortalecer tambin, su punto de ventas como miscelnea y con ello aprovechara el mercado ya cautivo del que goza su tienda. .
texts.en: Dewin is 32 years old, he has a store in the Malambo municipality, some 15 minutes from the city of Barranquilla. He lives with his partner and 6 year old son; they are his motivation to give his all to his work and to obtain their wellbeing. Dewin is a teacher by profession that got business experience is his fathers home and since he was a boy he saw how they got their family ahead through their work. This is why three years ago when he received his severance pay he didnt think twice about setting up his own business which is now a very important part of his familys income. The business is managed by his wife in the mornings and the afternoons by himself since he works in a school in the mornings. Dewins goal is to support his growth to be more profitable each day and surely he will achieve it since he is a family man, very organized and hardworking. His Kiva loan through Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo is his first, he will buy supplies, stationary, and miscellaneous general articles since he wants to stock his store and make good use of the market that his store has cornered.

loan.use: buy supplies, stationary, and miscellaneous general articles.

loan.name: Sandra Maria

texts.es: Sandra Maria posee un negocio que es venta de recargas telefnicas y alquiler de triciclos. Tiene ms de 6 aos en este negocio, ha buscado como mantener a sus 2 hijos este negocio lo aprendi por la necesidad de sufragar los gastos del hogar, es una persona muy luchadora y disfruta de su actividad. Solicita este financiamiento para realizarle mejoras a triciclo comprar llantas, asientos, forros y recargas telefnicas. El desea con mejorar su capital y proporcionar ms ingresos para su hogar.
texts.en:
Sandra Mara has a business selling telephone recharge time cards and leasing tricycles. Shes been in business 6 years. She has sought ways to support her two children. She learned this business because of the need she had to meet household expenses. Shes a very tenacious person who enjoys her work.
She is asking for this loan to do some improvements on the tricycle: to buy tires, seats and seat covers. She will also buy more telephone recharge cards. She hopes to improve her capital and provide more income for her home.

loan.use: to buy tires, seats and seat covers for her tricycle and to buy telephone time cards.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy chicken, chicken gizzards, beef, rice, flour, eggs, beans, soft drinks and charcoal.

loan.name: Consuelo

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal GRAN RENOVACION; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Consuelo; ella tiene 54 aos de edad y es conviviente y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de ropa y zapatos, ella vende casacas, chompas y polos, ella trabaja en forma independiente llevando a lugares como Brasil, la socia tambin trabaja como profesora en el sector educacin, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de ropa y zapatos. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar mercadera como zapatos y ropa al por mayor.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sra. Consuelo, 54, belongs to the GRAN RENOVACION community bank in the Peruvian "departamento" of Cusco.
She is partnered and has 4 children. She operates a clothing sales business. Among other things, she sells shoes, coats, sweaters and shirts, working as far afield as Brazil. She also works as a tutor, but the business provides her with an extra income so that she can better provide for her children. She wants to expand the business so she's applying for a loan that she will use to buy wholesale supplies of merchandise that she will resell.
She is grateful for the loan and committed to repaying it in the agreed-upon time.

loan.use: to buy wholesales supplies of merchandise for her clothing business.

loan.name: Hector Belisario

texts.es:
Hector Belisario tiene 65 aos, es casado vive con la esposa en el Cantn Chillanes Provincia de Bolvar.
Los miembros de la V.R.C. COOPERATIVA Patrn San Miguel se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Pailaloma a 60 minutos de la oficina pertenece al Cantn Chillanes, esta ventanilla de 13 miembros se dedica a las labores agrcolas de cultivos de maz, papas y trigo.
Hector se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz, papas y trigo, los productos los compra en Chillanes y en San Pablo cada fin de mes y los vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes.
Solicita el crdito para la comprar de insumos para los cultivos adems de fertilizantes y abonos. Con el apoyo del crdito le ayudara econmicamente para suplir sus necesidades y aumentar la produccin. Enfrentar desafos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueo es comprar una casa y tener mas terrenos para seguir sembrando.
Le gustar ser una persona responsable.
texts.en:
Hctor Belisario is 65 years old, married and lives with his wife in Chillanes Canton, Bolvar Province.
The Patrn San Miguel (Patron Saint Michael) communal bank is located in Palialoma Recinto, 60 minutes from the office. It belongs to Chillanes Canton. The communal bank has 13 members who are corn, potato and wheat farmers.
Hctor is a corn, potato and wheat farmer. He buys his supplies in Chillanes and San Pablo at the end of each month and his sales take place at the Sunday market in Chillanes.
He is asking for this loan to buy farming supplies in addition to fertilizer and manure. Support from the loan will help him economically to meet his needs and increase production. The challenges he faces are infestations, illnesses and weather variations. His dream is to buy a house and to have more land to farm.
He likes to be a responsible person.

loan.use: to buy farming supplies in addition to fertilizer and manure.

loan.name: Kangni

texts.fr: Retrait de 56ans, Mr Kangni est mari une revendeuse et ils ont en charge 02 enfants. Cest un homme dynamique malgr son ge et veut assurer un avenir radieux sa famille. Il a un pressing LOVER PRESSING depuis 2009. Ce second prt lui servira acheter des nouveaux matriels de travail afin de satisfaire au mieux ses clients.
texts.en: A 56-year-old retired man, Mr. Kangni is married to a retailer, and the two have two children in their care. He is a dynamic man despite his age, and he wants to ensure a bright future for his family. He has run a dry-cleaning business called "Lover Drycleaning" since 2009. This second loan will allow him to purchase new working materials in order to meet the needs of his customers.

loan.use: to purchase new materials for his dry-cleaning business

loan.name: Bethel 4, 5 & 8 Group

texts.en:
Rafaela is one of the members of the group Bethel 4, 5 & 8. This group is located in one of the rural communities surrounding San Pedro D. Macoris. They are 15 borrowers who are businessmen and businesswomen. Rafaela makes her home in a simple structure with her long-term partner and their 4 children. Her business is based on underwear sales from her house and by walking to sell.
Rafaela is excited to be taking her 8th loan with Esperanza after having successfully repaid her previous loan and grown her business. She has had her business for almost 4 years. She plans to use this loan to invest in her business by purchasing dozens of pairs of underwear for men, women and kids, and also swimwear. She will use her profits to invest in her business and to save.
Her group is located in San Pedro D. Macoris, a city famous for baseball players and the sugarcane industry. The main economic activities here are a free traD. zone and a cement factory.

loan.use: to buy underwear

loan.name: Crisologo

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal GRAN RENOVACION; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
El socio es el Sr. Crisologo; el tiene 59 aos de edad y es casado y tiene 4 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de ropa, el vende en forma independiente como casacas, ropas interiores, chompas y pantalones llevando a diferentes lugares como instituciones, el socio quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de ropa. El socio solicita el prstamo para comprar ropa al por mayor como pantalones, casacas y ropas interiores.
El socio est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sr. Crisologo, 59, is a member of the GRAN RENOVACION community bank in the Peruvian "departamento" of Cusco.
He is married and has 4 children. He operates a clothing sales business. Among other things, he sells coats, underwear, sweaters and pants, offering his merchandise everywhere he can find buyers. He wants to expand and improve his business so he's applying for a loan to buy wholesale supplies of merchandise such as pants, coats and underwear that he will then resell.
Sr. Crisologo is grateful for the loan and committed to repaying it in the agreed-upon time.

loan.use: to buy wholesale supplies of clothing for his retail business.

loan.name: Kossiwa Flicit

texts.fr: Mme Kossiwa est marie un Revendeuse de produits de denres alimentaires, des mdicaments et du sodabi (boisson locale faite base de palmier huile trs apprcie chez nous) depuis 2000 et marie transitaire et mre de 04 enfants. Elle achte au Grand march de Lom et revend son domicile. Elle sollicite ce second prt pour renforcer son activit.
texts.en: Mrs. Kossiwa has been a retailer of food products, medicines and sodabi (a local drink made from palm-tree oil that is well-loved in her homeland) since 2000 and is married to a forwarding agent and is the mother of 4 children. She buys at the Big Market of Lom and re-sells from her home. She is asking for a second loan to strengthen her business.

loan.use: to purchase commercial products to strengthen her business.

loan.name: Miriam Del Socorro

texts.es: Myriam vive en un lugar muy cerca al mar con su esposo y sus 4 hijos en las edades de 20 a 29 aos y en el barrio Modelo o de la ciudad de Barranquilla, tiene un negocio llamado Sala de Belleza Imagen Tice que inici recin finaliz sus estudios , cuando compr la peluquera; ella inici apoyndose en una estilista y 6 meses despus empez su intervencin, aplicando todos sus conocimiento de la academia y su ya adquirida experiencia de estos meses, al servicio de sus clientes, as ha logrado ser muy conocida en este sector y sus clientes ahora la refieren a otras personas que necesitan de sus servicios de belleza y en asesora de imagen personal y profesional. Myriam es una mujer feliz, su esposo y ella apoyan los gastos del hogar y sus hijos son mayores de edad y estn muy bien formados, razn por la cual su principal preocupacin y ocupacin es su negocio con el que planea ser muy exitosa, pues su negocio tiene poca competencia en el sector, tiene una muy buena infraestructura, cuenta con dos estilistas y un peluquero y sus clientes cada da aumentan; el credikiva es su primer financiamiento con el cual comprar un lava cabezas, una silla de peluquera, porque ingresar un nuevo peluquero y una mesa de manicurista, con lo cual ser ms efectiva la respuesta a sus clientes. Su sueo ms adelante es adquirir el local donde se encuentra ubicada, porque en la actualidad paga arriendo y quiere tener disponibilidad de servicios construyndole una segunda planta; igualmente suea con que sus hijos continen su realizacin en todas sus reas.
texts.en:
Myriam lives in a place very close to the sea with her husband and four children who range in age from 20 to 29. She has a business called Sala de Belleza Imagen Tice (Imagen Tice Beauty Salon) located in the city of Barranquillas Modelo neighborhood. She opened it shortly after finishing her training.
When she purchased the barber shop she relied on a stylist but six months after that she began to work herself applying all the skills shed learned at the academy and the experience shed gotten over these months to her customers service. Thus she has managed to become very well known in this sector and her customers now refer other people to her who need her beauty salon services and personal and professional image consulting.
Myriam is a very happy woman. She and her husband see to the household expenses. Her children are all well developed adults. As a result, her main worry and emphasis now is her business which she intends to make very successful although it has a lot of competition in the area. It has very good infrastructure. She employs two stylists and a barber and the number of her customers grows daily.
The Kiva loan is her first loan. She will use it to buy a sink to wash hair, a barbers chair (because a new barber will be joining the staff) and a manicurists table to provide a more effective response to her customers.
Her dream for later on is to buy the locale shes presently located in because currently she rents it and she wants to add other services to it by adding a second story. She also dreams with her children continuing to develop in all their areas.

loan.use: to buy a sink to wash hair, a barber's chair and a manicurist's table.

loan.name: Benedicta

texts.es: Benedicta es socia del Banco Comunal Hermanas de Choquetanca II ubicado en el distrito de Ilave, provincia El Colla y departamento de Puno, tiene 56 aos de edad, est casada y tiene tres hijos (2 independientes). La seora no cuenta con estudios. Con la participacin de su esposo y de su hijo se dedica a la compra y venta de ganados vacunos y ovinos. Desde hace un ciclo trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos. Con su primer prstamo de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, increment el capital de su negocio. Con ste nuevo prstamo de S/. 1000.00 nuevos soles, comprar tres ovejas para su engorde para luego venderlo en la localidad de Ilave. Su sueo es mejorar el ganado y as mejorar tambin sus ganancias. Le gusta del Banco Comunal es la facilidad del prstamo.
texts.en:
Benedicta is a member of the Hermanas de Choquetanca II communal bank located in Ilave District, El Collao Province, Puno Department. She is 56 years old married and has three children (two independent). She never attended school.
With her husbands and sons help she is a cattle and sheep merchant. Shes been working with the Manuela Ramos Movement for one cycle. She used her first, 500 new sol, loan to increase her business capital. She will use this new, 1000 new sol, loan to buy three sheep to fatten up for subsequent sale in Ilave. Her dream is to improve the livestock to improve her income too.
What she likes about the communal bank is the ease of the loan.

loan.use: to buy three sheep.

loan.name: Petrona

texts.es: Doa Petrona es una mujer D. 83 aos D. edad que vive en uno D. los barrios ms alegres y tradicionales D. la ciudad D. Barranquilla, con un importante movimiento comercial y que histricamente nos recuerda que all se construy el primer aeropuerto D. la ciudad; Doa Petrona en su condicin D. viuda, ha educado a 3 hijos, hoy en las edades D. 22 a 44 aos mediante actividades empresariales ; ella inici con el negocio D. confecciones , D. all pas la venta D. refrescos y bebidas, como gaseosa, chicha y cerveza y aprovechando la oportunidad que le ofreciera un mercado conquistado, le adicion la actividad D. venta D. mercanca variada como pantalones, jeans, suteres y blusas.; en la medida en que su negocio fue creciendo lo adecu con su enfriador que le permite vender sus refrescos bien fros en el clido clima D. la ciudad D. Barranquilla. Doa Petrona observando una oportunidad D. vender en mayor volumen, quiere distribuir cervezas por cajas a los negocios cercanos, porque muchos D. ellos se quedan los fines D. semana sin bebidas hasta que llegue el camin D. esa empresa y Doa petrona quiere generarle la opcin D. tener sus refrescos rpidamente y as ella tambin generar otro ingreso, por eso con su Credikiva, cuarto financiamiento que hace a la Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo, comprar cajas D. cervezas y gaseosas y tambin invertir en jeans, suteres y blusas que ya tiene encargadas.
