Con los anteriores crditos ha logrado incrementar su capital D. trabajo y sus clientes han ido creciendo, aumentando sus ventas, sus planes son aportarle todo su esfuerzo al crecimiento D. su microempresa y por ello trabaja persistentemente.
texts.en:
Petrona is an 83-year-old woman who lives in one of Barranquillas most joyful and traditional neighborhoods. It has important commercial activity and historically reminds us that the citys first airport was built there.
In her widowhood, Petrona has raised three children, who today range in age from 22 to 44, through business activities. She started out selling sweets. Then she went into beverage sales like soft drinks, chicha (corn based drink) and beer taking advantage of the already captive clientele she had. She then added sales of miscellaneous merchandise like pants, jeans, sweaters and blouses. As her business grew she equipped it with a cooler that makes it possible for her to sell her beverages ice cold in Barranquillas hot climate.
Petrona sees the opportunity to sell in larger volume so wants to start selling beer by the case to nearby businesses because lots of them run out of beverages on weekends and have to wait until the delivery trucks from the respective firms come by. Petrona would like to offer them the opportunity of having access to their refreshments quickly while she acquires an additional source of income.
This is why she will use her Kiva loan, her fourth loan with Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo, to buy cases of beer and soft drinks. She will also invest in jeans, sweaters and blouses that she already has pending orders for.
Her previous loans allowed her to increase her working capital so her customer base and her sales have grown. Her plan is to put all her efforts into her micro business and this is why she works so persistently.

loan.use: to buy cases of beer and soft drinks and also to buy jeans, sweaters and blouses she has pending orders for.

loan.name: Anggella Alexandra

texts.es: Anggella es socia del Banco Comunal Unin Arco Deustua ubicado en el distrito de Puno, provincia de Puno y departamento de Puno, tiene 30 aos de edad, es conviviente y tiene 01 hijo. Estudi educacin superior. Hace cinco aos que trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos, su primer prstamo fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invirti en el negocio que tena, ella se dedicaba a la venta de productos de belleza, ropas, abarrotes; actualmente tiene un centro de rehabilitacin teraputica. Con ste nuevo prstamo de S/. 700.00 nuevos soles, comprar sillas, cortinas y materiales para el negocio de rehabilitacin, en el negocio le ayuda su esposo, suegro y hermanas, es decir, es un negocio familiar. Su sueo es crecer y comprar ms maquinas para la rehabilitacin. Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la unin la alegra que comparte con las dems socias.
texts.en:
Anggella is a member of the Unin Arco Deustua communal bank located in Puno District, Puno Province and Department. Shes 30 years old, has a live in spouse and one son. She studied higher education.
Shes been working with the Manuela Ramos Movement for five years. Her first loan was for 300 new soles, money she invested in a business she had. She used to sell beauty products, clothes and groceries. Today, she has a therapeutic rehabilitation center.
She will use this new, 700 new sol loan, to buy chairs, drapes and other supplies for the rehabilitation center. Her husband, father-in-law and sisters help her in the business. That is to say, its a family business. Her dream is to grow and buy more machines for rehabilitation.
What she likes about the communal bank is the companionship and joy she shares with the other members.

loan.use: to buy chairs, drapes and other supplies.

loan.name: Benita

texts.es: Benita tiene 38 aos de edad, est casada con Eduardo de 39 aos, son padres de 03 hijos, y juntos residen en la selva tropical de la ciudad de Santa Rosa, donde tienen su propia casa. Benita es una mujer muy osada, trabaja en sociedad con su esposo, ambos abrieron una cerrajera donde elaboran puertas enrollables, ventanas de metal, adems reparan y sueldan todo tipo de metal. Gracias a este tipo de trabajo est obteniendo buenos ingresos econmicos, ya que ofrecen un buen servicio, en donde sus clientes se sienten satisfechos por el buen acabado. Actualmente es ms perseverante en mejorar su trabajo con el fin de cumplir la necesidad de sus clientes y que se sientan ms a gusto. Su taller est ubicado en su mismo barrio de su propia localidad, los horarios de atencin son de lunes a sbado. Su plan a futuro es seguir creciendo y trabajar con la misma tenacidad que la caracteriza. Este es su sexto crdito con MFP, por el cual se asegura cumplir puntualmente con su cronograma de pagos, adems agradece a su banco comunal, ya que obtiene buenos beneficios econmicos. Con el crdito solicitado comprar mas barras de metal que le ser de gran utilidad para seguir elaborando todo tipo de trabajo que requieren sus clientes.
texts.en:
Benita, 38, is married to Eduardo, 39. They are the parents of three children and they all live together in the tropical jungle in the city of Santa Rosa where they have their own house.
Benita is a very daring woman. She works in partnership with her husband. They opened a metal shop together where they manufacture roll-up doors, metal windows and also repair and weld all types of metal. Thanks to this type of work shes earning good income because they offer a good service where their customers feel satisfied with the good finishings. She is currently most focused on improving her work in order to meet her customers needs so that they will be even more satisfied.
Her workshop is located in the same neighborhood. They are open Monday through Saturday. Her plan for the future is to continue to grow and work with the same tenacity that characterizes her.
This is her sixth loan with MFP and she commits to repay in a timely fashion. In addition, she is grateful to her communal bank because she obtains good economic benefits.
She will use the requested loan to buy more metal bars that will be very useful to continue doing all sorts of jobs her customers require.

loan.use: to buy more metal bars.

loan.name: Paxboch Group

texts.es:
Doa Santos Margarita es casada, tiene 51 aos D. edad, curs los tres aos D. educacin bsica, tiene 12 hijos 2 D. los cuales estan estudiando, se dedica a atender partos, y a la crianza D. animales en este caso la crianza D. gallina D. engorD., lleva ya 19 aos con este oficio, cuenta con el apoyo D. su esposo quien se dedica a aserrar madera.
Organiza un grupo para solicitar un prestamo, que lo utilizar para invertir para la compra D. pollos ya que tiene como objetivo principal tener una granja mas granD.; las dems integrantes se dedica a diversas actividades: crianza D. animales, venta D. tacos y servicio D. atencin a partos. Esperan aumentar el tamao D. la granja, para mejorar D. igual manera su condicin D. vida.
texts.en:
Doa Santos Margarita is married. She is 51 years old. She had three years of basic education. She has 12 children, 2 of whom are in school. Her work is attending at births, and she also raises animals, in particular, she raises hens to fatten. She has been doing this for 19 years. She has help from her husband, whose work is sawing wood.
She is organizing a group to apply for a loan, which she will use to invest in the purchase of chickens, since her principal objective is to have a larger farm. The other members work in various activities: raising animals, selling tacos, and attending at births. She hopes to increase the size of her farm and in the same way to improve her living conditions.

loan.use: to buy chickens.

loan.name: Maria Mercedes

texts.es:
Mercedes tiene 39 aos de edad y vive en una pequea comunidad rural perteneciente al distrito de Lambayeque.
Mercedes se dedica a la elaboracin y venta de tortas y bocaditos desde hace 5 aos. Esta actividad la desarrolla en su domicilio y cuenta con clientela establecida que esta ms que satisfecha con los deliciosos productos que Mercedes hace.
Mercedes ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa un prstamo de 1000 nuevos soles que utilizar para la compra de ingredientes (harina, manteca, huevos, azcar, leche, etc.) para realizar sus tortas y bocaditos. La gran demanda que tienen los productos de Mercedes le exige contar siempre con los insumos necesarios a la mano pues sus pedidos estn a la orden del da.
Mercedes estara muy agradecida de concedrsele el crdito pues necesita de sus ingredientes para seguir laborando. Ella es una mujer con muchos deseos de superacin y sabe que puede lograr sus metas pues en la zona no tiene mayor competencia.
texts.en:
Mercedes, 39, lives in a small rural town in Lambayeque.
Mercedes has operated a food sales business, making and selling cakes and snacks, for 5 years. She operates the business from her house and has a long list of customers who line up for her delicious cakes and snacks.
Mercedes has applied to Edpyme Alternativa for a 1000 new soles loan that she use to buy the ingredients (flour, butter, eggs, sugar, milk, etc.) that she needs to make her cakes and snacks. She wants to ensure that she always has enough of the ingredients she uses to make her cakes and snacks so she can meet any level of demand for her products.
Mercedes would be very grateful to you if you would help her with this loan because she needs it to continue operating her business. She plans to work hard and she knows that she can reach her goals because there's no competition for her products in the neighborhood.

loan.use: Comprar ingredientes.

loan.name: Dionisia

texts.es: Dionisia, de 53 aos de edad, est casada con Agustn de 54 aos de edad y fruto de ese amor concibieron 05 hijos y juntos viven en su propia casa situada en la ciudad de Sante Rosa. Para tener su propia heladera, no fue tan fcil como ella lo esperaba, ya que el primer mes de funcionamiento solo tuvo escasos clientes y lo que perciba solo le alcanzaba para su canasta familiar. Dionisia puso mucho empeo en mejorar en la elaboracin de sus helados, en donde introdujo nuevos sabores como: mango, pera, pltano, guanbana, entre otras frutas, con la finalidad de que sus clientes estn ms que satisfechos. Con el transcurrir de los meses perfeccion su producto, hoy tiene un lugar considerable en su localidad y reconoce que la clave de su xito radica en la perseverancia y en la innovacin de sus nuevos sabores, es por ello que se siente contenta con su negocio. Sin embargo las temporadas de lluvia perjudican su negocio. Con el transcurso del tiempo anhela ampliar su puesto ya que cuenta con espacios masivos. Este es su sexto crdito con MFP, por el cual se compromete a seguir cumpliendo con sus obligaciones de pago, adems est satisfecha por el buen trato que recibe por parte de los socios de su banco comunal. Con el crdito solicitado comprar nuevas maquinas para la elaboracin de sus helados.
texts.en:
Dionisia, who is 53 years old, is married to Augustn, who is 54, and as the fruit of this love, they conceived five children. They live together in their own house located in the city of Sante Rosa. It was not as easy as she expected to have her own ice cream shop, since the first month it was open, she only had a few customers, and what she earned was only sufficient for her family expenses. Dionisia put much determination into improving the manufacture of her ice creams, and she introduced new flavors such as mango, pear, banana, and guanbana (a tropical fruit), among other fruits, with the result that her clients are more than satisfied. With the passing of the months, she perfected her product. Now she has a substantial location, and she recognizes that the key to her success is rooted in perseverance and in the innovation of her new flavors. This is why she feels satisfied with her business. Nevertheless, the rainy season hurts her business. With the passing of time she wants to enlarge her stand because there is ample space available.
This is her sixth loan with MFP, and she promises to continue fulfilling her obligations to make payments. Furthermore, she is satisfied with the good treatment that she receives from the members of her communal bank. With the loan that she is applying for, she will buy new machines to make her ice creams.

loan.use: to buy machines to make ice cream.

loan.name: Juana

texts.es: Juana forma parte del Banco comunal Nueva La Greda perteneciente a la localidad de Penco, ciudad de Concepcin. Ella se dedica al rubro de corte y confeccin de ropa, desde hace 25 aos. Juana trabaja desde su casa, para lo cual utiliza el espacio de su comedor, como taller para atender a sus clientas en la prueba de ropa y toma de medidas. Trabaja de lunes a viernes en un horario de 7 a 22 horas. Sus clientes requieren sus servicios a pedido, especialmente para la temporada de colegio, temporada de Fiestas patrias, matrimonios y fiestas de graduacin. Juana es quien se encarga de comprar la tela para posteriormente confeccionar, ya que tiene una vasta experiencia y conocimiento en la calidad de telas y comercios donde comprar. Junto con esto les brinda facilidades de pago a sus clientes. Ella siempre est innovando en sus confecciones, de acuerdo a la moda de temporada. El crdito lo utilizar para comprar telas, napas y cenefas para incursionar en el cortinaje, confeccin de cortinas. Sus metas son ampliar su casa, para habilitar su taller de confeccin en un espacio de su casa que no interfiera con su vida cotidiana y familiar. Adems anhela comprar otra mquina industrial para su taller de confeccin. Juana vive junto a su esposo y sus dos hijas de 21 y 13 aos de edad, su hija mayor estudia tcnico en enfermera y arsenalera. Sus sueos a nivel personal son continuar trabajando en el mismo rubro de corte y confeccin, para costear los estudios superiores de sus hijas. Juana est muy contenta y agradecida del crdito otorgado por Fondo Esperanza, ya que es una oportunidad para invertir en su negocio, lo cual le permitir generar mayores ganancias. Respecto a las reuniones que se realizan junto al grupo del Banco comunal, estas son muy amenas y Juana ha aprendido a registrar sus gastos, el trato a sus clientes y la bsqueda de redes sociales. Penco es una comuna cercana a la ciudad de Concepcin, al sur de Chile, regin del Biobo. Su nombre viene del mapudungun y significa "agua de peumo". Es una de las comunas con mayor cantidad de habitantes en la regin. Cuenta con centros industriales y un puerto.
texts.en:
Juana is a member of the communal bank "Nueva La Greda", in the town of Penco in the city of Concepcin.
She has been in the dress-making business for 25 years, and works out of her home in an area in the dining room set up to attend to customers for fittings and taking measurements. Her works hours are Monday through Friday, from 7:00 a.m. to 10:00 p.m. She takes orders especially during the school season, and for patron saint festivities, marriage ceremonies and graduations. Juana takes care of buying the fabric because of her vast experience and knowledge regarding fabric quality and places to shop. She also gives easy payment terms and is constantly renewing her designs according to the latest fashions.
The loan will be used to buy fabric, leather and borders to begin making curtains. Her goal is to expand her house and build a sewing shop somewhere inside it that does not interfere with everyday family life. She also wants to buy an industrial sewing machine for her shop.
Juana lives with her husband and has two daughters, ages 21 and 13, and her eldest daughter is studying to be a nurse technician and surgeon's assistant. Juana's goal is to keep working in the same field and be able to pay for her daughters' higher education. She is pleased and grateful for the loan through Fondo Esperanza since it allows her to invest in her business and generate more income. Regarding the meetings held at the communal bank, Juana finds them amenable and has been able to learn about keeping expense records, how to treat customers and use of social networks.
Penco is a community close to the cty of Concepcin, in southern Chile, in the region of Biobo. The name comes from the Mapudungun and means "peumo water". It has one of the largest populations in the region, and industrial centers and a port.

loan.use: To buy fabric, leather and borders to make curtains.

loan.name: Jesus Nazareno

texts.es:
Jess tiene 28 aos de edad, es soltero y es conocido por ser una persona responsable y trabajadora que goza de muy buenas referencias personales, por parte de sus vecinos. l vive en una campia en la zona rural del distrito Razuri perteneciente a la provincia de Ascope.
Jess se dedica a la compra y venta de esprrago y cuenta con gran experiencia en este negocio. Es conocido en su comunidad y trabaja con los agricultores de la zona que lo consideran un amigo.
Jess ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa un prstamo de 2000 nuevos soles que desea invertir en su negocio. Con este prstamo Jess quiere comprar esprrago de campos de cultivo para comercializarlo a su distinta clientela.
l estara muy agradecido de concedrsele el crdito pues le sera de gran utilidad para su negocio y desarrollo personal as como econmico.
texts.en:
Jess, 28, is single and known for being a responsible, hard working person who has very good personal references from his neighbors. He lives out in the countryside in the rural part of Razuri District which belongs to Ascope Province.
Jess is an asparagus merchant. He has a lot of experience in this business. Hes known in the community and works with the local farmers who consider him a friend.
Jess has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a 2000 new sol loan to invest in the business. Jess plans to use this loan to buy asparagus from the field to sell to his various customers.
He would be very grateful if this loan were granted because it would be very useful for his business as well as his personal and economic development.

loan.use: to buy asparagus to sell.

loan.name: Angela Gardenia

texts.es:
Angela de 50 aos, tiene un pequeo saln de belleza ya que en su juventud trabajo como ayudante en una peluquera. Poco a poco fue guardando dinero para poder tener su propio local.
En la actualidad trabaja desde muy temprano en su propio local de belleza. Poco apoco a comprado todos los implementos y herramientas para trabajar con eficiencia para sus clientes. Trabaja desde las 10h00am hasta las 20h00pm todos los das. Hace cortes de cabello, tinturados, anchados, maquilla etc.
Tiene muchas aspiraciones con su negocio por eso quiere el prstamo para comprar cosmticos y poderlos vender en su local. En el futuro quiere agrandar el local.
texts.en:
Angela, 50, has a small beauty salon. In her youth, she worked as an assistant in a hair salon. Little by little she saved money so that she could have her own place of business.
Now she starts work each morning in her own beauty salon. She has gradually managed to buy all of the tools and equipment that she needs to work effectively with her customers. She works from 10am until 10pm every day. She does haircuts, dyes, hair straightening, makeup, etc.
She has a lot of aspirations for her business, and for this reason she wants a loan so that she can buy cosmetics to sell in her salon. In the future, she wants to expand her salon.

loan.use: to buy cosmetics for her beauty salon

loan.name: Rocio Del Milagro

texts.es:
Rocio tiene 22 aos de edad es madre soltera de 2 menores hijos con quienes vive en una comunidad urbana del distrito de San Jos en Lambayeque. El distrito de San Jos es un puerto pesquero.
Con ms de 3 aos de experiencia, Rocio se dedica a la venta de pescado fresco en localidades cercanas a la suya. Rocio limpia el pescado y lo traslada en grandes cubetas desde el puerto hasta su lugar de venta. Los utensilios que ella utiliza para realizar su actividad se encuentran demasiado gastados y es por eso que Roco ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa un crdito de 1000 nuevos soles que utilizar para comprar nuevos utensilios y parte de este prstamo tambin ser destinado a la reparacin del techo de su casa.
Roco estara muy agradecida de concedrsele el crdito pues la compra de utensilios nuevos le servir para dar una mejor presentacin del producto a sus clientes y por lo tanto generar ms ventas que le permitirn seguir haciendo reparaciones en su vivienda.
La reparacin del techo de su casa es solo el primer paso de las mltiples reparaciones que Rocio tiene que hacer en su vivienda para tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Rocio is 22 years old. She is a single mother who has two dependent children. They live together in an urban community, in San Jos district, in Lambayeque. San Jos district is a fishing port.
Rocio has more than three years experience selling fresh fish in nearby towns. She cleans the fish and moves them in large ice trays from the port to her place of sale. The tools that she uses to carry out her business are very worn and, for that reason, Rocio has requested a loan for 1,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa that she will use to buy new ones. Part of her loan money will also be used to repair the roof of her house.
Rocio is very grateful for this loan since buying new tools will help her to better present her products to her customers. This will enable her to make more sales which will allow her to continue making repairs to her home. Repairing her roof is only the first step in a series of repairs that Rocio has to make to her home in order to enjoy a better quality of life.

loan.use: to buy utensils and repair her roof

loan.name: Domis Yaquelini

texts.es:
Domis es una madre joven de 23 aos de edad, ella vive con sus dos menores hijos en casa de su madre en una comunidad urbana en vas de desarrollo llamada Jos Leonardo Ortiz en Chiclayo.
Domis es vendedora, ella cuenta con una bodega en la cual ofrece desde artculos de escritorio, prendas de vestir y accesorios hasta golosinas y bebidas. La tienda de Domis es una tienda muy concurrida debido a la variedad de productos que ofrece, ella est en este negocio desde hace 2 aos y los resultados obtenidos han sido positivos.
La tienda de Domis se encuentra ubicada en un puesto fijo del mercado Moshoqueque (el mercado de mayor venta y variedad de la regin de Lambayeque). Domis conoce a la perfeccin su negocio pues ella viene de una familia de comerciantes que le han enseado todo lo necesario para tener un prspero oficio.
Domis solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un crdito de 2000 nuevos soles que desea invertir en la compra de mercadera por la campaa del da del padre. Ella piensa obtener un mayor nmero de ganancias, con esta campaa, las cuales quiere ahorrar para abrir un segundo puesto en otro de los mercados con mayor afluencia del distrito de Chiclayo.
Domis es una mujer luchadora con deseos de superarse y darles una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos. Ella cuenta con un buen historial de pagos.
texts.en:
Domis is a 23 year-old mother who lives with her two dependent children in her mother's home, in a developing urban community called Jos Leonardo Ortiz, in Chiclayo.
Domis is a saleswoman. She owns a store where she sells stationery products, clothes, accessories, candies and drinks. Domis' store is very busy owing to the wide variety of products that she sells. She has been in this business for two years and her results have been positive.
Domis' store is located in a fixed stall in Moshoqueque market (the busiest market with the widest range of products in Lambayeque region). Domis knows her business to perfection since she comes from a family of salespeople who have taught her all she needs to know in order to run a prosperous business.
Domis is requesting a loan for 2,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa that she would like to invest in buying merchandise for Fathers Day. She is planning to make more profits during this sales period. She would like to save her profits so that she can open up a second sales location in another busier market in Chiclayo district.
Domis is a hard-working woman who has a desire to improve herself and provide her children with a better quality of life. She has a good payment record.

loan.use: to buy merchandise for Fathers Day

loan.name: El Trebol I Group

texts.es: Esta foto fue tomada en casa de la seora Sandra un integrante D. grupo El Trbol 1, Que esta ubicado en VeraC., Mxico. Se ve la seora dentro de su casa junto a las dems integrantes D. grupo en la foto. Ella se dedica a venta de productos naturistas que inicio hace 2 aos. Solicita el prstamo para invertirlo en mercanca para surtir sus pedidos. Sus clientes la consideran una persona trabajadora y responsable, en la cual se puede confiar. Al momento de solicitar este prstamo se siente satisfecha por poder invertir en su negocio. Tiene 25 aos, estudio hasta el bachillerato, es casada y tiene 1 hijos varon. Quiere este crdito para poder invertir en producto para surtir sus pedidos que le hacen. Tambin espera poder ahorrar para rentar un local ms grande ya que tiene mucha mercancia y no le es sufuciente el que tiene. Con las ganancias que obtenga quiere ahorrar una parte para la educacin de su hijo y as logre una carrera Universitarias y una mejor calidad de vida para toda su familia.
texts.en:
This photo was taken in Sandras house; a member of the El Trbol 1 (Clover) group located in VeraC., Mxico. In the photo she can be seen inside her house together with the other members of the group.
She has sold natural products for the last two years. She is asking for the loan to buy merchandise to fill her orders. Her customers consider her to be a hard working, responsible person that they can trust. At the moment of soliciting the loan, she feels satisfied for being able to invest in her business.
She is 25 years old, studied up to high school, is married and has a son. She wants the loan to be able to invest in products to stock the orders she has pending. She also hopes to be able to save up to rent a larger locale because she has a lot of merchandise and the space she has available isnt enough. She wants to save whatever profits she gets part for her sons education so that he will attain a university degree and for a better quality of life for all her family.

loan.use: to buy natural products.

loan.name: Benita Angela

texts.es: Benita es socia del Banco Comunal Unin Arco Deustua ubicado en el distrito D. Puno, provincia D. Puno y departamento D. Puno, tiene 55 aos D. edad, est casada y tiene ocho hijos (5 independientes). La seora no cuenta con estudios. Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desD. hace tres aos, su primer prstamo fue D. S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invirti en su negocio venta D. comidas rpidas. Con ste nuevo prstamo D. S/.1000.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invertir en la compra D. arroz, fideos, azcar, queso, pescado, pollo, condimentos, etc., todo esto para la preparacin D. los alimentos que elabora. En el negocio la ayuda su esposo, hijos y una seora quien le ayuda a pelar las papas y el chuo. Su sueo es mejorar el negocio y tener un kiosco para vender ms. Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la puntualidad D. los pagos y la unin con las socias.
texts.en:
Benita is a member of the Unin Arco Deustua communal bank located in Puno District, Puno Province and Department. Shes 55 years old, married and has 8 children (five independent). She never went to school.
Shes worked with the Manuela Ramos Movement for three years. Her first loan was for 300 new soles that she invested in her fast food business.
She will use this new, 1000 new sol, loan to buy rice, noodles, sugar, cheese, fish, chicken, condiments, etc. All of this is to use preparing the meals she makes. Her husband and children help her in the business as well as a woman who helps her peel the potatoes and the chuo (dehydrated, freeze-dried tuber). Her dream is to improve the business and have a kiosk in order to sell more.
What she likes about the communal bank is the punctuality of the payments and the unity with her fellow members.

loan.use: to buy rice, noodles, sugar, cheese, fish, chicken, condiments, etc.

loan.name: Zenaida

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal CAMINEMOS JUNTAS; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Zenaida; ella tiene 34 aos de edad y es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de artesana, ella tiene una tienda de artesana donde vende chompas, chalinas y muecas, ella trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6.00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de artesana. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar implementar su tienda de artesana y comprar artesana al por mayor.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Zenaida is a member of the "Caminemos Juntas" community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and department.
Zenaida is 34 years old, lives with her partner, and has three children. She divides her time between her daily activities and her business selling handicrafts. She owns a handicraft store where she sells sweaters, scarves and dolls. She works from 8.00am to 6.00pm. Through this business, she gets her children ahead in life. Zenaida would like to expand her business selling handicrafts. She is requesting this loan to stock her handicraft store and buy handicrafts wholesale.
Zenaida is happy to be receiving her loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loan.use: to stock her handicraft store and to buy handicrafts wholesale

loan.name: Maria Erlinda

texts.es:
Erlinda es una cliente de 54 aos de edad que vive junto a su esposo e hijos en una pequea comunidad rural en vas de desarrollo del distrito de Illimo en Lambayeque.
Erlinda es una mujer trabajadora, ella se dedica a la venta de animales por toda la zona de Illimo y adems cuenta con una bodega de comestibles, en la que vende abarrotes, golosinas y bebidas; que tiene gran demanda. Erlinda ayuda con estas dos actividades a su esposo, quien es albail, en los gastos del hogar.
Erlinda solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un crdito de 2500 nuevos soles que repartir en sus dos negocios. En primer lugar comprar animales y alimento para estos y en segundo lugar comprar mercadera para surtir su negocio.
Erlinda tiene muchos deseos de crecer en ambos negocios para poder mejorar su calidad de vida, es por ello que de concedrsele el crdito ella estara muy agradecida por la gran utilidad que este le traera.
texts.en:
Erlinda is 54 years old and lives together with her husband and children in a small, developing, rural community in Illimo district, Lambayeque.
Erlinda is a hard-working woman who sells animals throughout Illimo district. She also has a grocery store where she sells groceries, candies and drinks. She has a lot of demand. Through these two business activities, Erlinda helps her husband, who is a construction worker, to cover their household expenses.
Erlinda is requesting a loan for 2,500 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa. She will divide this money between her two businesses. She will buy animals and animal feed and also merchandise with which to stock her store.
Erlinda has a great desire to grow in both of her businesses so that she can improve her quality of life. For this reason, she is very grateful for her loan as it will be very useful to her.

loan.use: to buy merchandise for her store and animals

loan.name: Wendy Pola

texts.es: Wendy es una joven de 23 aos de edad, propietaria de variedades Quik , negocio ubicado en el barrio Santa Maria de la ciudad de Barranquilla donde vive con su cnyuge; desde el ao 2009 decidi emprender su propia aventura de negocios, despus de haber trabajado y adquirido durante varios aos experiencia como vendedora de un almacn; Wendy es procedente de San Onofre una poblacin del departamento de Sucre y lleg , cuando tena 2 aos, a la ciudad de Barranquilla de la mano de sus padres, quienes le han provisionado bienestar y la posibilidad de estudiar, acompaada de una actitud proactiva hacia el trabajo. Ella estudia licenciatura en humanidades, lengua castellana e idiomas en la universidad y simultneamente trabaja. En su negocio vende ropa femenina y masculina, as como tambin accesorios tipo miscelnea, que ofrece mediante el sistema de crdito y tambin de contado respondiendo a las necesidades de su clientela, ubicada principalmente en el barrio donde vive. Este es su primer financiamiento y con el comprar ropa para caballeros, colonias, pauelos y accesorios varios, preparndose para atender la demanda que viene a propsito de la celebracin del da del padre, poca de mucho movimiento comercial, durante la cual se incrementan sus ventas usualmente. Su sueo es tener varios puntos comerciales y terminar sus estudios universitarios para postularse en la Polica nacional como profesional y ella trabajar persistentemente para lograrlo.
texts.en:
Wendy, a young lady who is 23 years old, is the owner of the Quik variety store, in the Santa Maria neighborhood of the city of Barranquilla, where she lives with her husband, In 2009 she decided to open her own business after having worked and gained several years of experience as a store saleslady. Wendy is from San Onofre in the department of Sucre, but moved to Barranquilla with her parents when she was two years old. They provided her with well-being, an education and a pro-active attitude regarding work.
She studies liberal arts, Spanish and foreign languages at the university, while also holding a job. She sells ladies' and men's clothing, as well as different accessories, on a credit or cash basis, whichever is most convenient for her customers who live mainly in her neighborhood. This is her first loan and it will be used to buy men's clothing, colognes, scarves and various accessories. This is in preparation for the high demand that will come with the celebration of Father's Day, usually a very busy time when normal sales increase. Her dream is to have several sales points and finish her education to try and become a national policewoman. She will work hard to make it happen.

loan.use: To buy men's clothing, colognes, scarves and various accessories.

loan.name: Roberto

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal CAMINEMOS JUNTAS; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
El socio es el Sr. Roberto; el tiene 73 aos de edad y es casado y tiene 8 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de artesana, el socio tiene una tienda de artesana en un lugar llamado Corao que queda a 20 minutos de la ciudad de Cusco, el socio por medio de este negocio saca adelante a sus hijos, el socio quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de artesana. El socio solicita el prstamo para comprar mercadera de artesana como chompas, chalinas, llaveros y muecas al por mayor.
El socio est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Roberto is a member of the "Caminemos Juntas" community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and department.
Roberto is 73 years old, married, and has eight children. He divides his time between his daily activities and his business selling handicrafts. Roberto has a handicraft store in a place called Corao which is 20 minutes from the city of Cusco. Through his business, Roberto gets his children ahead in life. He would like to expand and improve his handicrafts business. Roberto is requesting this loan to buy handicrafts such as sweaters, scarves, keychains and dolls wholesale.
Roberto is happy to be receiving his loan and pledges to make his repayments on time.

loan.use: to buy handicrafts such as sweaters, scarves, keychains and dolls wholesale

loan.name: Jorge Luis

texts.es:
Jorge es un joven de 25 aos de edad que vive con sus padres en la zona urbana del distrito de Chiclayo. Jorge es conocido por ser un joven trabajador con muchos deseos de superacin. l desea independizarse de sus padres y poder tener su casa propia.
Jorge se dedica a brindar el servicio de transporte pblico de mototaxi. La mototaxi es una moto que cuenta con una cabina en la parte posterior donde se pueden transportar pasajeros. Jorge tiene dos mototaxis una administrada por l y la otra dada en alquiler. Jorge se dedica a este negocio desde hace 5 aos y sus rutas se dan alrededor del mercado Moshoqueque, donde existe una gran afluencia de personas.
l solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un prstamo de 2000 nuevos soles que destinar en la compra de 2 motores para sus motos. Esto mejorar su capacidad de servicio y por consiguiente tendr un mejor rendimiento. Jorge desea ahorrar para, en un futuro, contar con su propio taxi.
Jorge es un cliente recurrente para Edpyme Alternativa, con un muy buen comportamiento de pago.
texts.en:
Jorge is a young man of 25 who lives with his parents in the urban area of Chiclayo. He is known as a hard-working young man who has a great desire to improve himself. He would like to become independent from his parents and own his own home.
Jorge provides a public transport service with his motorcycle taxi. A motorcycle taxi is a motorbike with a cabin in back for transporting passengers. Jorge has two motorcycle taxis. He drives one himself and hires out the other one. Jorge has been in this business for five years and his routes are based around Moshoqueque market, where there are a lot of people.
Jorge is requesting a loan for 2,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa which he will use to buy two engines for his motorbikes. This will improve his service and make him more money. Jorge would like to save up so that, in the future, he can own his own taxi.
Jorge is a long-standing client of Edpyme Alternativa and has a good repayment history.

loan.use: to buy two engines for his motorbikes

loan.name: Edna Arcelia

texts.es: Edna Arcelia es socia del Banco Comunal Unin Arco Deustua ubicado en el distrito de Puno, provincia de Puno y departamento de Puno, tiene 63 aos de edad, de estado civil separada, tiene cuatro hijos, todos independientes. La seora estudio educacin secundaria. Hace ms de ocho aos que trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela R., su primer prstamo solicitado de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles dinero lo invirti en su negocio, ella se dedica a la venta de comidas (restaurant, sanwicherias y dulceras). Tambin nos cuenta que en sus ratos libres se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza, negocio que tambin le genera ganancias. Con ste nuevo prstamo de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, incrementar al capital de su negocio para comprar colonias joyas y perfumes, tambin cuenta que invertir en la compre de insumos para la elaboracin de alimentos para eventos. Su sueo es seguir con el negocio por que dice que es una distraccin. Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la unin y la puntualidad entre las socias..
texts.en:
Edna Arcelia is a member of the communal bank "Unin Arco Deustua" in the district, province and department of Puno. She is 63 years old, separated and has four independent children. She has a secondary education.
For eight years she has been working with the Manuela R. Movement. She invested her first loan of 300 PEN in her food business (restaurant, sandwiches and sweets). In her free time she also sells beauty products which generates extra income.
The new loan in the amount of 500 PEN will be used as business capital to buy colognes, jewelry and perfumes. She also plans to buy supplies to prepare food for events.
Her dream is to continue with her business because it keeps her busy. What she likes about the communal bank is the solidarity and punctuality of the members.

loan.use: To buy colognes, jewelry, perfumes, and supplies.

loan.name: Mercedes Del Socorro

texts.es: Mercedes, tiene su propio negocio, con ms de siete aos en las ventas de tortillas, refrescos y frijoles cosidos, pues ha sido su medio para sobrevivir, y apoyar a sus tres hijos, dos de ellos casado, cuando inicio con veinte cinco libras de maz, lo que capto cliente, y comienza a invertir para seguir palmeando mas tortillas. Quien tiene la ayuda de su hija, su negocio comienza a tener ms demanda lo que recurre al financiamiento para poder palmear los tres tiempos, a si como la venta de frijoles. Hoy en da es su segundo prstamo en Afodenic en donde invertir en quince quintales de maseca, dos quintales de frijoles, dos quintales de azcar, y treinta libras de queso, con el objetivo de ir aumentando su pequeo negocio, el cual se le hace fcil ya que da a da los clientes llegan a la comprar tortillas logrando las otras ventas. y que en planes futuro espera seguir invirtiendo para una mejor solidez econmica al tener siempre su negocio fijo.
texts.en:
Mercedes has her own business. Shes been selling tortillas, soft drinks and cooked beans for over seven years; this has been her means of support and to help her three children, two of them married. She started with just 25 pounds of corn and won over her first customers. She then started to invest to continue making more hand-made tortillas.
Her daughter helps her. Her business is starting to have more demand so she is relying on financing to be able to make tortillas and cooked beans for all three shifts.
This is her second loan with Afodenic which shell use to buy fifteen quintals of corn tortilla dough, two quintals of beans, two of sugar and thirty pounds of cheese with the goal in mind of enlarging the small business which she thinks will be easy since more and more customers arrive each day to buy tortillas and buy the other things too. Her future plan is to continue investing to attain better economic strength so that her business will stay strong.

loan.use: to buy beans, sugar, cheese, etc.

loan.name: Yhasmany

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal CAMINEMOS JUNTAS; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
El socio es el Sr. Yhasmani; el tiene 23 aos de edad y es soltero; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de cigarros, el negocio es de su mama y juntos trabajan juntos, el socio distribuye los cigarros al por mayor a las diferentes tiendas de abarrotes, el socio tambin estudia en un instituto y tambin trabaja en una empresa de seguridad, el socio quiere ampliar y mejorar en sus negocios y en su estudio. El socio solicita el prstamo para comprar cigarros al por mayor y tambin para pagar algunas mensualidades de su instituto.
El socio est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Yhasmani, 23, is a member of the CAMINEMOS JUNTAS (Lets Walk Together) communal bank located in Cusco District which belongs to Cusco Province and Cusco Department.
He is single. He alternates his daily chores with selling cigarettes. The business belongs to his mother and they work together. He sells the cigarettes at wholesale to various grocery stores. He is also studying at an institute and is employed by a security firm. He wants to expand and improve his business and his schooling.
He is asking for the loan to buy some cigarettes at wholesale and also to pay some of his institutes monthly fees. He is happy about the loan and commits to pay his installments.

loan.use: to buy cigarettes at wholesale and also to pay some of his monthly school fees.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: To buy rice, oil, beef, pork, 3-minute soups, chicken, beans, juices and sodas.

loan.name: Rosa

texts.es:
Rosa tiene 25 aos de edad, ella vive con sus dos hermanos menores y sus padres en una comunidad pequea y netamente rural del distrito La Arena en Piura.
La actividad que desarrolla Rosa es la produccin y comercializacin de harina y chicha de Jora (bebida macerada de maz),que acompaa con pequeos platos de comida. Esta actividad la realiza desde hace ms de 7 aos en su domicilio y desde muy joven aprendi los secretos de la buena preparacin de la chicha y harina de Jora (maz) algo que le ha trado consigo consecuencias positivas pues ahora ella cuenta con una gran demanda debido a la calidad de sus productos.
Rosa solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un prstamo de 1000 nuevos soles que invertir en la compra de jora (el cual es el insumo principal de su negocio) pues el precio de este maz ha aumentado debido a la baja en su cosecha y ella necesita tener la cantidad adecuada para la preparacin de sus productos.
Rosa es una mujer con muchos deseos de superacin que desea ampliar su negocio y comercializar su deliciosa chicha y harina a otros sectores.
texts.en:
Rosa, 25, lives with her two younger siblings and her parents in a small, completely rural community in La Arena District in Piura.
Rosas activity is making and selling corn flour and Chicha de Jora (beverage made from corn) that goes with small plates of food. Shes been doing this for over 7 years at home. She learned the secret of preparing delicious chicha and jora (corn) flour while still very young and this is something that has brought positive results because the high quality of her products has led to their being in very high demand.
Rosa asks Edpyme Alternativa for a 1000 new sol loan to buy jora (which is the main ingredient in her business) because the price of corn has increased due to diminished crop yields and she needs to have the necessary amount to prepare her products.
Rosa is a woman with a strong wish to succeed who wants to expand her business and sell her delicious chicha and flour in other sectors.

loan.use: to buy corn.

loan.name: Francisca

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal CAMINEMOS JUNTAS; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Francisca; ella tiene 42 aos de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de cigarros y champus,ella trabaja en forma independiente distribuyendo los cigarros y champs a diferentes lugares como Ayacucho,Anadahuaylillas,Lima y Juliaca y tambin distribuye a las diferentes tiendas de abarrotes, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de cigarros y champus. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar champs y cigarros al por mayor.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Francisca, 42, is a member of the CAMINEMOS JUNTAS (Lets Walk Together) communal bank located in Cusco District belonging to Cusco Province and Cusco Department.
She has a spouse and two children. She alternates her daily chores with cigarette and shampoo sales. She works independently selling her cigarettes and shampoo in various places like Ayacucho, Anadahuaylillas, Lima and Juliaca; she also sells to different grocery stores. This is how she supports her children. She wants to expand and improve the cigarette and shampoo sale business and is asking for the loan to buy shampoo and cigarettes at wholesale.
She is happy about the loan and commits to pay her installments.

loan.use: to buy shampoo and cigarettes at wholesale.

loan.name: Anonymous Group
loan.use: To buy fish, shrimp, crab, clams, lobster, and cutlets.

loan.name: Erika Roxana

texts.es:
Roxana tiene 24 aos de edad y es madre soltera de un pequeo nio. Desde hace 7 meses vive en una casa alquilada en la parte rural del distrito de Eten- Chiclayo. Roxana es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora que siempre ha luchado por el bienestar de su hijo.
Roxana se dedica a la elaboracin de bordados, tejidos, gallardetes, banderolas entre otros, as como a la elaboracin de sombreros de junco. Esta actividad la aprendi de su madre y la viene realizando desde hace 3 aos. Su buena elaboracin ha hecho que Roxana tenga una clientela fija y por consiguiente una gran demanda.
Ella solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un prstamo de 500 nuevos soles para comprar material de trabajo como telas, hilos, agujas y junco (ramas similares a las de palma utilizadas para elaborar sombreros) para poder desarrollar satisfactoriamente su trabajo y seguir obteniendo ingresos para el bienestar de ella y de su hijo.
Roxana tiene muchos deseos de mejorar su calidad de vida y siente que con gran empeo y dedicacin lo lograr.
texts.en:
Roxana is 24 years old. She is a single mother and has one young child. For seven months she has lived in a rental house, in the rural part of Eten district, in Chiclayo. Roxana is a hard-working and entrepreneurial woman who has always worked hard for the well-being of her son.
Roxana makes embroidered items, woven items, pennants, banners, etc. She also makes hats from reeds. She learned this business from her mother and has been in the business for three years. Her good work has earned Roxana a regular customer base and good demand for her products.
Roxana is requesting a loan for 500 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy work materials such as fabric, threads, needles and reeds (branches similar to the palm leaves which are used to make hats), so that she can make satisfactory progress in her work and continue making income for her own well-being and that of her son.
Roxana has a great desire to improve her quality of life and she feels that she will achieve this through her determination and commitment.

loan.use: to buy fabric, threads and needles

loan.name: Juana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal CAMINEMOS JUNTAS; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Juana; ella tiene 49 aos de edad y es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de artesana, ella trabaja con el material de cueros, ella hace trabajos en cuero como colchas, llamas y vicuas y luego los vende llevando a lugares como Juliaca y Sicuani, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de trabajos en cuero. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar cuero de distintos colores.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Juana, 49, is a member of the CAMINEMOS JUNTAS (Lets Walk Together) communal bank located in Cusco District belonging to Cusco Province and Cusco Department.
She has a spouse and three children. She alternates her daily chores with the sale of crafts. She works with animal pelts. She makes items out of llama and vicua leather like bedspreads that she then takes to places like Juliaca and Sicuani to sell. This method of work allows her to support her children. She wants to enlarge and improve her business of leather sales and is asking for a loan to buy pelts in assorted colors.
She is happy about the loan and committed to repay.

loan.use: to buy animal pelts in assorted colors.

loan.name: Edith

texts.es: Edith tiene 28 aos, es una mujer trabajadora, vive en un su propia casa junto a su pareja Adolfo de 33 aos y sus 02 queridos hijos Andover de 11 aos y Adely de 02 aos de edad, quienes son el motivo de todos sus esfuerzos. Los productos que con tanto voluntad y entrega han logrado cultivar le han ayudado mucho en el progreso de su vida. Todas las maanas empieza a trabajar en sus tierras, pues sabe que del cuidado que le brinde a sus sembros de cacao, caf y plantas de barbasco, depender la calidad de los productos que obtenga. Lo que ms le gusta de su trabajo es cuidar sus cultivos y se siente muy feliz cuando los ve grandes y frondosos. Lleva 06 aos realizando esta actividad y considera que lo ms difcil es transportar sus productos hasta la ciudad de San Francisco, lugar donde recibe mejores precios por sus granos y races de barbasco. En adelante, espera sembrar ms plantas de cacao y barbasco ya que cuenta con espacios sin cultivar. Este es su quinto crdito con MFP, sabe que tiene que pagar todas sus cuotas puntualmente y est dispuesta a hacerlo. En su banco comunal es una socia muy solidaria y responsable. Con el crdito solicitado contratar jornaleros para que le brinden el apoyo en el mantenimiento respectivo de sus plantas como la poda de sus plantas y sacar la mala hierba que crecen en sus campos.
texts.en:
Edith is 28 years old. She is a hard-working woman who lives in her own home together with her partner, 33 year-old Adolfo, and her two beloved children (11 year-old Andover and 2 year-old Adely) who are the motivation behind all her efforts.
The crops that Edith has managed to grow with so much will and devotion have helped her a lot in making progress in life. Every morning, she starts working on her land since she knows that the care that she provides for her cacao, coffee and barbasco plants will affect the quality of the end crops that she obtains. What Edith most enjoys about her work is caring for her plants and she feels very happy when she sees them grow big and lush. She has been in this business for six years and she considers the most difficult part of her work to be transporting her produce to the city of San Francisco which is where she receives the best prices for her beans and barbasco root. In the future, she hopes to sow more cacao and barbasco plants since she has land that is currently not cultivated.
This is Edith's fifth loan from MFP. She knows that she must make all her repayments on time and she is ready to do so. Edith is a very supportive and responsible member of her community bank. She will use the loan she has requested to hire day laborers to support her in looking after her plants, for example by pruning her plants and getting rid of the weeds that grow in her fields.

loan.use: to hire day laborers

loan.name: Anonymous Group
loan.use: to invest in merchandise for her grocery store

loan.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es:
Miguel es un padre de familia de 30 aos de edad, l vive junto a su esposa y su pequeo hijo de 4 aos en casa de sus padres en el distrito de Guadalupe en Pacasmayo La Libertad.
Miguel se dedica a la compra y venta de gas para cocina. l lo reparte a domicilio y este trabajo le ha ayudado a mantener a su familia. Sin embargo, Miguel tiene deseos de ampliar su negocio pues quiere mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y tener una casa propia.
Miguel solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un crdito de 1000 nuevos soles que invertir en su negocio, comprando ms balones de gas para venderlos y poder ampliar su clientela, esto le traer consigo mayores ganancias para mejorar su calidad de vida. Miguel aspira a ser el mayor proveedor de gas en toda su zona y sabe que poco a poco lo lograr.
Miguel pudo realizar su negocio gracias al financiamiento de nuestra entidad, es un cliente que cancela sus pagos puntualmente.
texts.en:
Miguel is a 30 year-old father who lives together with his wife and 4 year-old son in his parents' home, in Guadalupe district, in Pacasmayo - La Libertad.
Miguel buys and sells cooking gas. He makes home deliveries and this work has helped him to support his family. However, he would like to expand his business as he would like to improve his family's quality of life and own his own home.
Miguel is requesting a loan for 1,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa which he will invest in his business, buying more gas cylinders to sell so that he can expand his customer base. This will bring with it more profits so that he can improve his quality of life. Miguel aspires to become the biggest gas supplier in his area and he knows that he will gradually achieve this goal.
Miguel was able to set up his business thanks to a loan from our institution. He is a client who repays his loans on time.

loan.use: to buy gas cylinders

loan.name: Fiorela Juana

texts.es: Fiorela es socia del Banco Comunal Unin Arco Deustua ubicado en el distrito de Puno, provincia y departamento de Puno, tiene 20 aos de edad, de estado civil soltera, no tiene hijos, estudio educacin superior. La seorita se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza y prendas de vestir, trabaja desde hace un ao con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos, su prstamo anterior fue de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invirti en su negocio. Con su nuevo prstamo de S/. 700.00 nuevos soles, comprar diez unidades de colonias. Su sueo es tener una tienda de cosmticos y terminar su carrera de Administracin. Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la solidaridad entre las socias.
texts.en:
Fiorela is a member of the "Unin Arco Deustua" community bank which is located in Puno district, in Puno province and department. She is 20 years old, single, doesn't have any children and has a high school level of education.
Fiorela sells beauty products and clothes. She has been working with Movimiento Manuela Ramos for one year. Her previous loan was for 500 Peruvian soles and she invested that money in her business. She will use her new loan for 700 soles to buy ten units of cologne.
Fiorela's dream is to own a cosmetics store and to finish her degree in administration / management.
What Fiorela likes about her community bank is the solidarity between the members.

loan.use: to buy ten units of cologne

loan.name: Soledad

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal CAMINEMOS JUNTAS; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Soledad; ella tiene 19 aos de edad y es soltera; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de frutas como naranjas, mandarinas, pomelos y limones, ella trae de lugares como Quillabamba y tambin lo vende en los distritos de Calca, Cusco y Pisaq y tambin la socia se est preparando para estudiar la carrera de contabilidad, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de fruta. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar fruta como mandarinas, naranjas y pomelos.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Soledad, 19, is a member of the CAMINEMOS JUNTAS (Lets Walk Together) communal bank located in Cusco District belonging to Cusco Province and Cusco Department.
She is single. She alternates her daily chores with the sale of fruit like oranges, mandarins, grapefruit and lemons that she brings from places like Quillabamba and sells in Calca, Cusco and Pisaq Districts. She is also getting ready to start studying Accounting. She wants to enlarge the fruit selling business and is asking for a loan to buy fruit like mandarins, oranges and grapefruit.
She is happy about the loan and committed to make her payments.

loan.use: to buy fruit.

loan.name: Norberto

texts.es:
Norberto tiene 35 aos de edad, vive con su esposa y sus 4 hijos en el distrito de Tambogrande en una comunidad rural con deseos de superacin.
La actividad a la que se dedica Norberto es la venta de productos de primera necesidad: avena, fideos, arroz, aceite, azcar, leche, caf, sal, etc. Esta actividad la realiza en su propio domicilio. Adicionalmente, Norberto se dedica a la crianza de ganado ovino y aves de corral los cuales cra y engorda para luego comercializarlos en el mercado local. Su esposa lo apoya en las actividades que realiza y existe una buena relacin familiar.
Norberto solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un crdito de 2000 nuevos soles para la compra de mercadera para surtir su negocio y la compra de alimentos balanceados para el engorde de sus ovinos y aves de corral que podr vender a un mejor precio.
Norberto es una persona trabajadora y honrada con muchos deseos de darle lo mejor a su familia y superarse.
texts.en:
Norberto tiene 35 aos de edad, vive con su esposa y sus 4 hijos en el distrito de Tambogrande en una comunidad rural con deseos de superacin.
La actividad a la que se dedica Norberto es la venta de productos de primera necesidad: avena, fideos, arroz, aceite, azcar, leche, caf, sal, etc. Esta actividad la realiza en su propio domicilio. Adicionalmente, Norberto se dedica a la crianza de ganado ovino y aves de corral los cuales cra y engorda para luego comercializarlos en el mercado local. Su esposa lo apoya en las actividades que realiza y existe una buena relacin familiar.
Norberto solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un crdito de 2000 nuevos soles para la compra de mercadera para surtir su negocio y la compra de alimentos balanceados para el engorde de sus ovinos y aves de corral que podr vender a un mejor precio.
Norberto es una persona trabajadora y honrada con muchos deseos de darle lo mejor a su familia y superarse.

loan.use: Comprar mercadera para negocio y compra de alimento para animales.

loan.name: Victorino Asuncion

texts.es: Victorino es un padre de familia de 59 aos de edad que vive junto a su esposa y a sus dos hijos menores de edad. Se dedica a la venta de mercadera en general desde hace mas de 12 aos, el desea adquirir inventario para mejorar la calidad de sus que ofrece, de este modo planea obtener mayores ingresos al momento de venderlos, para realizar su objetivo se ha visto en la necesidad de solicitar a un crdito con cual comprara pantalones, calzado, cosmticos, sabanas y toallas. El es una persona que brinda todo su esfuerzo en las actividades que realiza, de modo que pueda sacar a su familia adelante.
texts.en: Victorino is a 59 year old father who lives together with his wife and two dependent children. Victorino has been selling general merchandise for more than 12 years. He would like to acquire inventory so that he can improve the quality of the products that he sells. In this way, he plans to make more income when he sells his goods. In order to achieve his goal, he has decided to request a loan that he will use to buy pants, footwear, cosmetics, sheets and towels. Victorino is a person who puts all his effort into his business activities so that he can get his family ahead in life.

loan.use: to buy pants, footwear, cosmetics, sheets and towels

loan.name: Georgina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal CAMINEMOS JUNTAS; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Georgina; ella tiene 40 aos de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de granos secos, la socia vende granos secos como trigo, papa, cebada y moraya,ella trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 8:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de granos secos. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar granos secos al por mayor.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Georgina is a member of the "Caminemos Juntas" community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and department.
Georgina is 40 years old, lives with her partner, and has two children. She divides her time between her daily activities and her business selling dried grains. She sells dried grains such as wheat, potato, barley and 'moraya' (freeze-dried potato). She works from 8.00am to 8.00pm and, through this business, she gets her children ahead in life. Georgina would like to expand and improve her business selling dried grains. She is requesting this loan to buy dried grains wholesale.
Georgina is happy to be receiving her loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loan.use: to buy dried grains wholesale

loan.name: Juan Francisco

texts.es:
Francisco es un cliente de 31 aos de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Tcume- Lambayeque, en una comunidad pequea y rural de gente trabajadora y emprendedora.
Francisco es un hombre trabajador que lucha por el bienestar de su familia, es por eso que se dedica a dos actividades. Francisco prepara pan y dulces que luego comercializa a los pobladores de su comunidad y tambin brinda el servicio de mototaxi (moto con cabina en la parte posterior para transporte de pasajeros). En muchas ocasiones utiliza su moto para llevar el pan y los dulces a casa de sus clientes.
Francisco cuenta con una clientela fija debido a la buena calidad de sus productos y servicios. Adems, los pobladores de la zona lo estiman mucho.
l solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un crdito de 2500 nuevos soles que invertir en la compra de ingredientes para sus panes, como harina y manteca y para hacerle mejoras a su mototaxi lo que le permitir seguir desarrollando sus actividades adecuadamente.
Francisco tiene muchos deseos de superacin y su esposa lo apoya en todas las actividades que este realiza, existe una gran unin familiar.
texts.en:
Francisco es un cliente de 31 aos de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Tcume- Lambayeque, en una comunidad pequea y rural de gente trabajadora y emprendedora.
Francisco es un hombre trabajador que lucha por el bienestar de su familia, es por eso que se dedica a dos actividades. Francisco prepara pan y dulces que luego comercializa a los pobladores de su comunidad y tambin brinda el servicio de mototaxi (moto con cabina en la parte posterior para transporte de pasajeros). En muchas ocasiones utiliza su moto para llevar el pan y los dulces a casa de sus clientes.
Francisco cuenta con una clientela fija debido a la buena calidad de sus productos y servicios. Adems, los pobladores de la zona lo estiman mucho.
l solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un crdito de 2500 nuevos soles que invertir en la compra de ingredientes para sus panes, como harina y manteca y para hacerle mejoras a su mototaxi lo que le permitir seguir desarrollando sus actividades adecuadamente.
Francisco tiene muchos deseos de superacin y su esposa lo apoya en todas las actividades que este realiza, existe una gran unin familiar.

loan.use: Comprar ingredientes para panes.

loan.name: Guillermo

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal CAMINEMOS JUNTAS; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
El socio es el Sr. Guillermo; el tiene 45 aos de edad y es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de transporte, el tiene un carro que hace servicio de taxi en las diferentes calles de la ciudad de Cusco y tambin el socio trabaja en construccin haciendo diferentes obras de construccin socio por medio de estos trabajos saca adelante a sus hijos, el socio quiere mejorar el servicio de taxi. El socio solicita el prstamo para mantenimiento de su carro para comprar algunos repuestos.
El socio est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Guillermo is a member of the "Caminemos Juntas" community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and department.
Guillermo is 45 years old, lives with his partner, and has three children. He divides his time between his daily activities and his transport business. Guillermo owns a car which he uses to provide a taxi service in the streets of the city of Cusco. He also works in construction, working on different construction projects. Through these jobs, he manages to get his children ahead in life. Guillermo would like to improve his taxi service. He is requesting this loan to have maintenance work carried out on his car and to buy some spare parts.
Guillermo is happy to be receiving his loan and pledges to make his repayments on time.

loan.use: to have maintenance work carried out on his car and to buy some spare parts

loan.name: Jorge Alberto

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal CAMINEMOS JUNTAS; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
El socio es el Sr. Jorge Alberto; el tiene 25 aos de edad y es conviviente; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de transporte, el es propietario de un carro que hace servicio de taxi, el socio trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 10:00 p.m, por medio de este trabajo el socio saca adelante a su familia, el socio quiere mejorar el servicio de taxi e imn0lementar su casa. El socio solicita el prstamo para comprar un televisor para su casa.
El socio est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Jorge Alberto is a member of the "Caminemos Juntas" community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and department.
Jorge Alberto is 25 years old and lives with his partner. He divides his time between his daily activities and his transport business. He owns a car which he uses to provide a taxi service. Jorge Alberto works from 6.00am to 10.00pm and, through this work, he gets his family ahead in life. Jorge Alberto would like to improve his taxi service and equip his home. He is requesting this loan to buy a television set for his home.
Jorge Alberto is happy to be receiving this loan and pledges to make his repayments on time.

loan.use: to buy a television set for his home

loan.name: Eben Ezer Group

texts.es:
Doa Olimpia, es casada, tiene 49 aos de edad, cuenta con 6 hijos, 2 de los cuales estan estudiando, se dedica a la crianza de animales, tiene 10 aos de experiencia en este oficio, inici con la crianza de pollos, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien se dedica a la confeccin de prendas.
Organiza un grupo para poder solicitar un prstamo a ASDIR que le servir para la compra de cerdos, ya que su sueo en el futuro, es contar con una granja reproductora de animales. Las dems integrantes del grupo se dedican a diversas actividades productivas que son: artesana, confeccin de tapados para bebes, confeccin ce blusas, confeccin de camisa y a la crianza de animales. Esperan alcanzar su propsito de mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Olimpia is 49 years old, married, and has six children, two of whom are still in school. Her business is raising animals and she has ten years experience in the business. She started out raising chickens. Olimpia has the support of her husband whose business is making clothes.
Olimpia put together a group so that she could request a loan from ASDIR which she would use to buy pigs since her dream is to own a breeding farm. The other members of the group carry out the following business activities: handicrafts, making baby coats, making blouses, making shirts and raising animals. They hope to reach their goal of improving their income.

loan.use: to buy pigs

loan.name: Nery

texts.es: Nery, de 39 aos de edad, convive con su pareja y tiene dos hijos en etapa escolar Wilder de 19 aos y Gleydi de 13 aos de edad. Juntos residen en la localidad de Santa Rosa, ubicada en la hermosa selva ayacuchana, donde tienen su propia casa. Nery recalca que todo lo que viene con el nombre de cacao genera negocio, es por ello que trata de darle el mejor cuidado respectivo a sus plantaciones de cacao, y bajo esa premisa es que muchos de sus compradores se han sentido satisfechos por la calidad de su producto agrcola. Sin embargo ella trata de esmerarse todo lo que pueda; pero sabe que esta actividad requiere de un mayor esfuerzo es as que contrata jornaleros para le faciliten en la extraccin de sus productos para que rpidamente puedan ser vendidos en los centros de acopio de su misma localidad y a un precio considerable. Su plan a futuro es invertir sus ingresos en otro tipo de negocios como tienda de zapatos. Este es su Q. crdito con MFP, por el cual asegura cumplir puntualmente con sus respectivos pagos, adems augura en que tendr mucho xito en su banco comunal. Con el crdito solicitado comprar mas plantas de cacao ya que tiene previsto injertarlos a medida que van desarrollando.
texts.en:
Nery is 39 years old. She lives with her partner and has two school-age children: 19 year-old Wilder and 13 year-old Gleydi. They live together in their own home in the town of Santa Rosa which is located in the beautiful Ayacuchan jungle.
Nery tells us that everything that comes with the name of cacao generates business. For this reason, she tries to provide the best care for her cacao plantations and many of her buyers are happy with the quality of her produce. Nery puts a lot of effort into everything she can but she knows that this business requires more effort and so she hires day laborers to help her in harvesting her crops so that they can be sold quickly to the middlemen in her town at a good price. Nery's plan for the future is to invest her profits in other types of business such as a shoe store.
This is Nery's fifth loan from MFP and she pledges to make her repayments on time. She also predicts that she will enjoy a lot of success with her community bank. Nery will use the loan she has requested to buy more cacao plants since she plans to graft them as they develop.

loan.use: to buy cacao plants

loan.name: Epifanio

texts.es: A la vivienda del seor Epifanio le esta haciendo falta el vitro piso en el interior. Esta solicitando un prstamo para poder comprar el material que necesita y pagarle a la persona que se encargara de realizar la mejora. Don Epifanio pagara el crdito con una parte del sueldo que recibe de su trabajo ya que es la fuente de ingreso que tiene para su familia. Desea que su pequeo hijo tenga la seguridad y que este en mejores condiciones para su crecimiento.
texts.en:
Epifanio's home needs Vitropiso (a brand of ceramic tile) flooring. He is requesting a loan so that he can buy the materials he needs and pay the person who will carry out the work.
Epifanio will repay his loan with part of the wages he earns in his job which is his family's source of income.
Epifanio would like his young son to be safe and for his house to be in better conditions as he grows.

loan.use: to lay Vitropiso flooring in his home

loan.name: Fouad

texts.en:
Fouad is a 30-year-old single man. He is the owner of a hardware retail shop. Fouad is a hardworker who is well-known in his area. He sells construction hardware and manufactures aluminum doors and kitchen closets. His business has increased in the past few years since construction faced an important renaissance.
Like most people his age, Fouad is working hard to improve his living to find a suitable wife so he can have a small happy family. He's not going to stop searching for a suitable wife, and at the same time he won't stop improving his business. That's why he has requested a loan from Al Majmoua in order to improve his business through increasing his hardware and aluminum inventory, which will lead to an increase in his income. He hopes to expand his business more and more in the future.

loan.use: increase his inventory of construction materials

loan.name: Las Amistosas 1 Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama LAS AMISTOSAS 1 y se ubica en el Estado de Mxico. Se distingue por su gente trabajadora, por su agricultura y ganadera. El grupo esta conformado por nueve integrantes y es la tercera vez que solicita un prestamo para mejorar sus negocios. Araceli es la presidenta del grupo. Inici su negocio hace un ao, la cual es una imprenta en la cul realiza estampados en playeras y logotipos en vasos para cualquier evento social, requiere el prestamo para comprar ms material de trabajo. Ella tiene 27 aos, estudi hasta sexto de primaria, es una persona con muchas ganas de superarse y tener un negtocio exitoso da con da, siempre con el deseo de brindarle lo mejor a su familia. Ella vive en unin libre y tiene una pequea hija de 5 aos. Con las ganancias que obtenga ahorrara una parte para la educacin de su hijas ya que tienen el sueo de verla graduada algun da y teniendo todas las aportunidades que ella no pudo tener.
texts.en:
This group is called 'Las Amistosas 1' (The Friendly Women) and is located in the State of Mexico which is noted for its hard-working people, its agriculture and its livestock raising. The group has nine members and this is the third time that they are requesting a loan to improve their businesses.
Araceli is the group's president. She started her printing business a year ago. She prints designs on t-shirts and logos on glasses for any social event. She needs this loan to buy more work materials. Araceli is 27 years old and studied up to the sixth year of elementary school. She is a person who has a great desire to improve herself and own a successful business in order to provide her family with the best. She lives with her partner and has a 5 year-old daughter. Araceli will save some of the profits she makes for her daughter's education since her dream is to see her graduate some day and to have all the opportunities that she herself could not have.

loan.use: to invest in raw materials for her printing business

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy raw materials such as glue, buckles, synthetic materials and accesories. He will also buy a leather sewing machine.

loan.name: Chocaculeu Group

texts.es:
Doa Lidia Anacelia, es soltera, tiene 24 aos D. edad, curs los 5 aos D. educacin primaria, se dedica al amarre D. hijo tpico y a la crianza D. animales vacunos, en este caso a la crianza D. toros, lleva 10 aos D. experiencia en el amarre D. hilo y 4 aos en la crianza D. animales.
DeciD. organizar un grupo para ampliar su capital D. trabajo para la crianza D. animales, para esta vez va a comprar toros, ya que quiere tener una granja; las dems integrantes del grupo se dedican a diversas actvidades: tejidos D. cortes tpco, crianza D. animales, venta D. tacos, y al amarre D. hilo tpico. Espera alcanzar su objetivo D. mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Lidia Anacelia is single and 24 years old. She did the 5 years of elementary school. She makes the traditional baby slings and raises cattle, in thia case bulls. She has 10 years experience with the slings and 4 years raising animals.
She decided to organize a group to grow her work capital to raise animals. This time she is going to buy bulls, since she wants to have a barn. The rest of the group members do different activities: traditional weaving, raising animals, selling tacos, and traditional baby slings. She hopes to reach her goal of improving her income.

loan.use: to buy bulls.

loan.name: Laguna Chica Group

texts.es: En el estado D. Veracruz en el municipio D. tezonapa existe una comunidad llamada Laguna Chica y en esa comunidad existe una UD. (grupos D. mas 10 personas que tienen una cuenta en el banco y tienen que reunirse semanalmente o quincenalmente para realizar sus pagos) la cual lleva el nombre D. laguna Chica porque es el nombre D. su comunidad. El grupo esta conformado por 11 integrantes. El representante del grupo se llama Rafaela tiene la edad D. 40 aos, estudio hasta el tercer grado D. secundaria, es madre soltera D. 2 hijos una mujer D. nombre Blanca que tiene 23 anos que ya esta casada y un hombre llamado Rufino D. 16 aos que asiste a la secundaria. Doa Rafa (como la llaman en la comunidad) nos platica que hace un poco mas D. 2 aos inicio con su propio negocio D. venta D. dulces, refrescos y comida corrida en su hogar, ella decidio iniciar su propio negocio ya que desea sacar a sus hijos adelante, ella necesita este credito para invertirlo en la compra D. tomates, chiles, cebollas, carne, masa, frijol,azucar, sal, col, aceite, gas, arroz, platos y vasos desechables para preparar su comida, a ella le ayuda mucho la ubicacion D. su casa ya que vive cerca D. la unidad D. salud D. su comunidad y les venD. su comida a los doctores y enfermeras, tambien nos dijo que espera en un futuro tener una pequea fondita donD. vender su comida y sus dulces. Los otros diez integrentes son: Claudia - venta D. ropa Reyna - venta D. zapatos Maria Antonia - venta D. ropa Iris Janeth - cocina economica Laura - club D. nutricion Maria del Rocio- venta D. abarrotes Florencia - venta D. zapatos Juana Maria - venta D. ropa Lidia Ivett - venta D. ropa Marocotit -venta zapatos
texts.en:
In the state of Veracruz, in the town of Tezonapa, there is a community called Laguna Chica.
